GR14muktacau:7: uditaṃ taṃ śacī-garbha-vyomni pūrṇaṃ vidhuṃ bhaje ||
GR14muktacau:8: nāma-śreṣṭhaṃ manum api śacīputram atra svarūpaṃ
GR14muktacau:11: prāpto yasya prathita-kṛpayā śrī-guruṃ taṃ nato'smi ||
GR14muktacau:14: ekadā kiñcin-mātra-śruta-pūrva-vṛttāntayā satyabhāmayā kṛṣṇaḥ sākūtaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ |
GR14muktacau:15: latās tā madhurāḥ kasmin jāyante dhanyanivṛti |
GR14muktacau:17: [* This verse is quoted in UN 11.66 as an example of maugdhya. There the first line
GR14muktacau:19: kās tā latāḥ kva vā santi kena vā kila ropitāḥ]
GR14muktacau:20: tatas tad-vṛttānta-smaraṇāt kṛṣṇaḥ svāntar-glānir bahir vihasyāha |
GR14muktacau:21: gataḥ sa kālo yatrāsīt muktānāṃ janma valliṣu |
GR14muktacau:23: tatas tad apūrvaṃ śrutvā sa-viśeṣa-śravaṇotkaṇṭhitayā tayā bāḍham āmreḍitaḥ
GR14muktacau:24: kṛṣṇaḥ punar āha | ekadā kārttike māsi gokule govardhana-girau
GR14muktacau:25: dīpa-mālikā-mahotsava āsīt | tatra sarvo jano vicitra-nepathya-sāmagrīṇāṃ
GR14muktacau:26: saṃskārāya sādhanāya ca paramāśakto babhūva | gopās tu svaṃ svaṃ bhūṣayanto'pi
GR14muktacau:27: viśeṣataḥ gavādi-paśūnāṃ prasādhanārtham udyuktā āsan | gopyaḥ kila
GR14muktacau:32: mayā ca vicakṣaṇa iti yathārtha-nāma-kīra-kumāra-mukhatas tan niśamya
GR14muktacau:33: sa-kautukaṃ tatra gatvātipremāspadasya haṃsī-hariṇīti nāmno dhenu-yugalasya
GR14muktacau:34: bhūṣaṇautsukyena tāsāṃ sakāśe mauktikāni prārthitāni || tataḥ
GR14muktacau:36: āñcalena sāvahelanam iva manāg eva mām avalokya
GR14muktacau:38: nirbharāveśa-viśeṣeṇa hārādi-gumphana-vilāsam eva vitanvatīs tāḥ prati sasmitam
GR14muktacau:41: vaguṇṭhita-karṇyaḥ! priya-vayasyasya mama prārthite kṣaṇam api karṇān
GR14muktacau:43: tatas tāsām īṣat smitvānyonyam ālokayantīnāṃ madhye pragalbhā lalitā vihasya
GR14muktacau:44: saroṣam iva vyājahāra | aye nāgara! etāni bahu-mūlyāni mauktikāni
GR14muktacau:45: rāja-mahiṣī-yogyāni | tava mahiṣīnām evālaṅkriyāyai satyam abhirūpāṇi kathaṃ
GR14muktacau:47: tatas tad-vacaḥ śrutvā mayā kautukenāviṣṭena sāmnā punaḥ punar idam evoktam |
GR14muktacau:48: bhoḥ priya-bhūṣaṇāḥ! sarvāṇi yadi na deyāni tadā
GR14muktacau:50: tato lalitā sarvāsāṃ mauktikāni punaḥ punaś cālayantī bhūyaḥ prāha | he kṛṣṇa!
GR14muktacau:51: kiṃ kartavyam ? tava dhenu-yogyam ekam api nāsti |
GR14muktacau:52: tadāham uktavān | ayi parama-cature lalite! tiṣṭha tiṣṭha | ahaṃ kārpaṇya-bhāk
GR14muktacau:53: paścāt tvayā vaktuṃ na śakya ity upālabhya satvaram ambāṃ vrajeśvarīm āgatya
GR14muktacau:54: mātar dehi me mauktikāni | ahaṃ tu tāni kṛṣṭa-kedārikāyām eva vapsyāmīti
GR14muktacau:55: punaḥ punar avocam | tato mātrā vihasyoktaṃ | vatsa na mauktikāny uptāni
GR14muktacau:57: tadā mayoktaṃ | mātar avaśyam eva dīyantāṃ dina-trayābhyantare prarūḍhāni
GR14muktacau:58: bhavaty eva sākṣāt kartavyānīty asman-nirbandha-parihārāsamarthayā tayā dattāni
GR14muktacau:60: yamunopakaṇṭhe pauruṣa-trayam avagāḍhāṃ kedarikāṃ niṣpādya sahāsaṃ
GR14muktacau:61: paśyantīṣu kāsucid gopikāsu tany uptvā sā punar apūri | parito vṛtiś ca kāṣṭhair
GR14muktacau:64: gavyeṣu prārthyamāneṣu solluṇṭhaṃ vihasya tāḥ procuḥ |
GR14muktacau:67: tatkedārikotpadyamāne phale nāsmābhirabhilāṣaḥ kartavyaḥ | iti śrutvā mayā
GR14muktacau:68: svagṛhāṇāṃ gavāṃ bahubhiḥ payobhireva tā darśayatā pratyahaṃ sekaḥ kriyate sma |
GR14muktacau:69: tataścaturthadivasa eva mauktikāni praūḍhāni | taddarśanenollasitena mayā
GR14muktacau:70: māturañcalaṃ gṛhītvānīya tadaṅkurā darśitāḥ | tān dṛṣṭvā tu mātā kimetaditi
GR14muktacau:71: manasi vicārayantī sandigdhā satī vrajaṃ jagāma | gopyas tu tacchrutvā hiṃsrā
GR14muktacau:73: tato nātivilambena mūrvākāriṇyastā mauktikalatā vistāriṇyaḥ samālocya
GR14muktacau:77: tato'ṣṭa-vidha-yonija-mauktikebhyo vilakṣaṇāṃ śriyaṃ dadhati muktāphalāni tāsu
GR14muktacau:78: jātāni tāni dṛṣṭvā vraja-vāsināṃ vismayo'tyarthaṃ jātaḥ | viśeṣataś ca gopīnām |
GR14muktacau:79: tataḥ praty aham eva tad-darśanena jāta-lobhās tāḥ mantrayāñcakrire | bhoḥ
GR14muktacau:80: sakhyaḥ bhadrena jñātam asmabhyaḥ kṛṣṇo mauktikāni sarvathaiva na dāsyatyeva |
GR14muktacau:81: bhavatu | tat-kṛta-mauktika-kṛṣi-prakriyāsmābhir na dṛṣṭāstīti na syāt |
GR14muktacau:82: tatrānadhyavasāyaṃ tyaktvā tad-dviguṇikāyāḥ kedārikāyayā ārambhaḥ kathaṃ na
GR14muktacau:84: iti śrutvāticaturā lalitā prāha -- bhoḥ pavana-vyādhi-vyāpṛtā gopyaḥ!
GR14muktacau:86: karma | tena yad añjasā kriyate tat kila mahā-siddhato
GR14muktacau:90: etāvatī śaktiḥ svataḥ sambhaved iti jānantyo'pi bhavatyaḥ
GR14muktacau:91: siddhauṣadhi-mantrādy-antareṇa yat-tat-karmaṇi pravartitum abhilaṣanti | tat khalu
GR14muktacau:95: siddha-mantram ekam ādāya kathaṃ na tathodyamaḥ kriyate ?
GR14muktacau:96: sarvāḥ -- bhadraṃ vadati tuṅgavidyeti nirṇīya tat-pārśvam upetya sa-vinayam
GR14muktacau:100: bāḍham akasmād asmād dṛśāṃ bhāgyātiśaya-vaśāt sākṣād bīja-rūpo'yam avasaraḥ
GR14muktacau:101: pratyāsanno babhūva | tad-vidagdhānāṃ śiromaṇīr apy etās tathā
GR14muktacau:102: yukti-sauṣṭhavātiśayena kṛtye'tra pravartayāmi | yathā sa tarus tvaritam eva
GR14muktacau:103: praūḍhaḥ phalavān bhaved iti manasi vicintya sāntarānandaṃ nāndī prāha -- bhoḥ
GR14muktacau:104: sakhyaḥ | satyaṃ mukundasya na mantra-kṛteyaṃ mṛdi mauktikā sṛṣṭiḥ |
GR14muktacau:105: sarvāḥ - tan nija-janena kāraṇa-śuktyādi-mātram antareṇa kathaṃ mṛttikāyām
GR14muktacau:107: nāndī -- asyā bhuvaḥ svābhāvikedṛk-prabhāvād eva | yad vividha-ratna-jananīyaṃ
GR14muktacau:108: vraja-vana-bhūr iti śrī-bhagavatī-pāda-padmaiḥ punaḥ punar nivarṇyate | ṛtam apy
GR14muktacau:111: -nānā-phalādimanto hiraṇmaya-mahīruhāḥ sphuṭam atra jātā jāyamānāś ca
GR14muktacau:112: dṛśyante | ato'syām upta-muktāphalāni janiṣyante phaliṣyanti ceti kiṃ citram ? tad
GR14muktacau:113: bhavatībhir api surabhitara-navanītādi-seka-pūrvakam atiprayatnena tathā tat-kṛṣiḥ
GR14muktacau:114: kriyatāṃ yathā tato'py adhikatamāni paramottama-phalāni labhyante |
GR14muktacau:115: iti tad-vacana-mādhurīm āpīya sa-santoṣaṃ sa-ślāghaṃ pratyayantyaḥ sarvās tām
GR14muktacau:116: āliṅgya nijāṃ sthalīm āgatya spardhayā maj-jayāya samucita-vetanato
GR14muktacau:118: kṛtvā peṭikāyām agrathitāni grathitāny aṅga-bhūṣaṇa-rūpāṇi ca yāvanti sthitāni
GR14muktacau:119: tāvanti yathā-yuktam alpāny eva saṃrakṣyāṅgataḥ samuttāritāni ca mauktikāni
GR14muktacau:120: niravaśeṣam uptvā pratyaham eva tri-sandhyaṃ go-dugdha-navanīta-suvāsita-ghṛtair
GR14muktacau:125: tataḥ katipayadināntare svasvakedārikāsu jātān hiṃsralatāṅkurān dṛṣṭvā
GR14muktacau:128: ekasmin dine gorasānāmatīvavyayaṃ svasvagṛhasya ca nimauktikatāṃ vīkṣya gopāḥ
GR14muktacau:130: tacchrutvā vṛddhā ūcuḥ | bho āyuṣmantaḥ | nānuyogaviṣayo'yamābhirbālābhiḥ
GR14muktacau:131: kṛto mauktikakedārikānāṃ nimittaṃ bahulo vyayo'cirādeva bahutaralābho
GR14muktacau:132: bhaviṣyati | yatkṛṣṇakedārikāyāṃ rājadārāṇāmapi durlabhāni muktāphalāni kila
GR14muktacau:134: athaikadā viśākhayā svadekārikāsu tānaṅkurānnirīkṣya kāsāñcit karṇe
GR14muktacau:135: nibhṛtamidamuktam | bhoḥ sakhyaḥ | kṛṣṇakedārikāmadhye mayā yādṛśā aṅkurā
GR14muktacau:136: dṛṣṭā ete tu tādṛśā na dṛśyante | na jāne paścāt kiṃ bhavet |
GR14muktacau:138: atha katipayadivasaistāsāṃ rādhādīnāmanyāsāṃ ca kedārikāsu kaṇṭakādicihnena
GR14muktacau:139: latābhirnijarūpe prakāśyamāne gopīkedārikāsu hiṃsrā latā jātā iti sakalagokula
GR14muktacau:141: etad ākarṇya vayasya-dvārā gāndharvā-goṣṭhyāṃ mayedaṃ sotprāsaṃ vijñāpitaṃ
GR14muktacau:142: śrutaṃ bhavatīnāṃ kedārikāsu bahūni muktā-phalāni jātāni santi | ahaṃ tāvat
GR14muktacau:143: snigdhas tat sa-vayasyāya mahyaṃ prathama-phalāni dīyantām |
GR14muktacau:144: tatas tābhir uktaṃ | yadi vayaṃ kṛṣim akariṣyāmas tadā sakala-goṣṭhaṃ
GR14muktacau:145: mauktikamayam abhaviṣyat | paśupālya-svadharmam apahāya sa iva kaḥ
GR14muktacau:147: tad ākarṇya mayā nikhila-vayasyāḥ savatsā gāvaḥ śakaṭa-vahā mahiṣyaḥ,
GR14muktacau:148: savarkarā ajā, vṛndāvana-vartinyaś ca mauktika-mayair mālādy-alaṅkārair
GR14muktacau:150: tataś ca gopyo lajjayā sva-bhūṣaṇa-vyatirekeṇa bahu-dhana-vināśena gopa-bhiyā ca
GR14muktacau:151: kim atra yuktam iti mantrayitum ārebhire | aye gṛhīta-kṛṣṇa-pakṣayā
GR14muktacau:152: dhūrta-nāndīmukhyā'bhadreṇa pratāritāḥ sma ity ābhāṣya sarps.aṃ tan-nikaṭam
GR14muktacau:153: āgatya tat-kathana-pūrvakaṃ bahuśas tābhir bhartsitā nāndīmukhī prāha | bhoḥ
GR14muktacau:154: tapobhyaḥ śape na mayā sarvathaiva pratāritāḥ stha, kintu yuṣmābhir eva tat sarvaṃ
GR14muktacau:157: nāndī | yato garvitābhir yuṣmābhir ḍhakkā-vādyavat kolāhala-prapañcena
GR14muktacau:158: savayasya-gaṇasya tasya śravaṇa-kuhare suṣṭhu-gocarīkṛtya kedārikāsu muktāḥ
GR14muktacau:159: sphuṭam uptāḥ tathā ko'py ekaḥ prahariko'pi tatra na rakṣitaḥ |
GR14muktacau:161: nāndī saroṣam | yaj jātaṃ tac caturaṃmanyābhiḥ śrūyatām | yuṣmān vijetum
GR14muktacau:162: abhīṣṭam iṣṭānna-pradānena suṣṭhu pralobhya dhūrta-guruṇā yuṣman-nāgareṇa
GR14muktacau:164: jātāṅkurāḥ sarvā muktā niravaśeṣaṃ samādāya tatra tatra hiṃsrāvallī-kadambān
GR14muktacau:165: samāropya kayatyaḥ pṛthak svakṛta ekasmin kedāre pratnataḥ saṃropitāḥ |
GR14muktacau:166: tathānyāsāṃ tu tathaivānīya kālindī-gabhīra-nīrāntaḥ prakṣiptāḥ | iti mayā
GR14muktacau:172: kaliyuga-tapasvini | tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti sabhrūbhaṅgaṃ tām ākṣipya sva-geham āgatya
GR14muktacau:173: punaḥ punas tad eva vicārayantī tāsu rādhā bhoḥ sakhyaḥ nāndīmukhī vā
GR14muktacau:174: pratārayatu sa dhūrtas tathā vā karotu adhunā tad-vicāreṇa ko lābhaḥ | sāmpratam
GR14muktacau:175: anyad duḥkhaṃ na gaṇyate | gurvādito bhayam eva naḥ khedayati | tad vayaṃ tu
GR14muktacau:176: tebhyo mauktikeṣu darśiteṣv eva śithilī bhavet | tādṛśāni sarvathaivātra
GR14muktacau:177: sudurlabhāni kintu kṛṣṇād eva mūlyena yathā gṛhītāni syuḥ | tatropāyaś
GR14muktacau:179: tataḥ sarvābhir vibhāvyoktam | candramukhī caturā bhavati | suvarṇāni gṛhītvā
GR14muktacau:181: tatas tayoktam | sampraty asmābhir upālabdhasya tasya samīpam aham ekākinī
GR14muktacau:182: gantum aśaktāsmi | kāñcanalatā mama saṅge samāgacchatu | iti sarvāsām
GR14muktacau:183: anumatyā bahu-suvarṇāni gṛhītvā mauktika-vāṭikā-samīpaṃ te ājagmatuḥ | tatra
GR14muktacau:184: tad-vāṭikādhikāriṇaṃ subalaṃ mayā saha niviṣṭam abrūtām | he subala śrutam
GR14muktacau:185: asmābhir bhavadbhir navya-muktāni vikrīyante | tad imāni śuddha-suvarṇāni
GR14muktacau:187: tataḥ smitvā mayoktam | tadānīm anekadhā prārthyamānaṃ naikam api mauktikam
GR14muktacau:188: asmabhyaṃ dattam | asmat-kedārikā-sekārthaṃ dugdha-pārī ca bhavatībhir na
GR14muktacau:189: dattā | asmābhir varaṃ kālindī-madhye prakṣeptavyam | tathāpi bhavatīnāṃ
GR14muktacau:192: tataḥ kāñcanalatayoktam | mauktika-nimittaṃ paty-ādibhyo yadi tāsāṃ bhīr na
GR14muktacau:193: bhavet tadāsya kadarthanoktim īdṛśīṃ kā nāma saheta | bhavatu kiṃ kartavyam |
GR14muktacau:194: haṭṭa-prasārita-bahuratnā madhurā tāvad dūre tad adya bhoḥ subala svayam eva
GR14muktacau:195: bhavatā madhyasthena bhūyatām | ānyatrika-mūlyād asmābhir viśeṣo'pi dātavyaḥ |
GR14muktacau:196: tataś ca viśeṣa-śabda-śravaṇān mayā vihasyoktam | bhavatu nāma
GR14muktacau:197: svabhāva-komalena mayā tu bhavatībhir iva kāṭhinyaṃ kartuṃ na śakyate | adattvā
GR14muktacau:198: vā anyat kiṃ kartavyam | kintu mauktikārdhinīnāṃ sarvāsāṃ
GR14muktacau:201: mayoktam | kas tāvad viśeṣaḥ | tataś candramukhī kiñcid vihasya kāñcanalatām
GR14muktacau:202: ālokitavatī | kāñcanalatātha salajjaṃ subalaṃ prati vyājahāra | sakhe subala svayam
GR14muktacau:203: eva madhyasthena bhūtvā samādhāya samīcīna-yaśo-bhāras tāvad aṅgīkriyatāṃ
GR14muktacau:205: subalenoktam | vayasya rahasyatayā bahu-mūlyatvaṃ kiyat kāñcanalatayā
GR14muktacau:206: prakaṭīkriyate | ātmano'bhīṣṭa-mūlyaṃ svayam eva sphuṭaṃ nigadya na kathaṃ
GR14muktacau:208: tato'ham abruvam | sakhe subala candramukhyā abhiprāyo jñātaḥ | muktāphalāni
GR14muktacau:209: grahītuṃ kāñcanalataiva vicāryānargha-mūlyatvena parikalpya rādhādibhiḥ prahitya
GR14muktacau:210: mama dattāstīti | kintu kāñcana-sañcayato'pi muktāphalānām adhikaṃ mūlyaṃ
GR14muktacau:211: jagati prasiddham | tasmād ekayaiva kāñcanalatayā katham etāsāṃ
GR14muktacau:212: mūlya-paryāptiḥ | yadi vā asyā bakṣasi svarṇa-sampūṭa-rūpa-phala-dvaye bahavaś
GR14muktacau:213: cintāmaṇayo'pi santīti candramukhī vakṣati tathāpi na | yato
GR14muktacau:216: tac chrutvā bhrū-bhaṅgena mām avalokayantī kāñcanalatā saroṣam āha -
GR14muktacau:217: nirbuddhike candramukhi! tadaiva mayoktaṃ tasya dhṛṣṭasya savidhe mayā na
GR14muktacau:218: gantavyam | tathāpi tvayāhyam āgraheṇānīya kadarthitāsmi | tvaṃ muktāphalāny
GR14muktacau:220: candramukhī āha - kāñcanalate! satyaṃ kathayasi tat katham ekākinyā mayā
GR14muktacau:221: mūlya-nirṇayo bhavatu | kathaṃ vā nijane'tra sthātavyaṃ ekayoga-nirdiṣṭānāṃ saha
GR14muktacau:222: vā pravṛttiḥ saha vā nivṛttir iti mayāpi gantavyam | ity ubhe eva gamanodyate
GR14muktacau:223: dṛṣṭvā mayoktam - subala! tadaiva mayoktaṃ yad etābhyāṃ mūlya-nirṇayo na
GR14muktacau:225: tac chrutvā tayoḥ savidham āgatya subalenoktam - sakhi candramukhi! vayasyasya
GR14muktacau:226: mūlya-viṣaye mahān āgraho dṛśyate | tena priya-sakhī rādhā lalitādibhiḥ sahāgatya
GR14muktacau:227: samakṣam eva samucita-mūlyaṃ pradāya svepsita-muktāphalāni gṛhṇātu | tatra
GR14muktacau:229: iti niśamya candramukhī-kāñcanalate tāsāṃ savidhe gatvā sa-roṣam iva sarvaṃ
GR14muktacau:231: tataś ca rādhā lalitādibhiḥ saha mauktika-bāṭī-prāntam āsādya
GR14muktacau:232: candramukhī-dvārā subalam ākārya tam āha - priya-vayasya subala | asmāsu
GR14muktacau:233: bhavato niraṅkuśaḥ snehaḥ | ataḥ svayam eva tathā vidhīyatāṃ yathāsmābhiḥ
GR14muktacau:235: tac chrutvā subalena mahyaṃ nivedya mad-vacanena mat-sannidhau tā lalitādayaḥ
GR14muktacau:237: mad-upadrāvaka-sva-priya-vayasyāya sarvathā na prakāśanīyam iti subalam
GR14muktacau:240: tato mayā tāḥ sarvā nibhālya rādhā kathaṃ na dṛśyate ity ukte tuṅgavidyayoktam -
GR14muktacau:241: gokula-yuva-rāja! sā khalu sa-praṇayaṃ āryayā jaṭilayā kasyacid
GR14muktacau:245: mayoktam - tuṅgavidye! muktā-grahaṇecchā tasyā na vidyate iti dṛśyate |
GR14muktacau:246: tatas tayoktaṃ - nahi nahi | tan-muktā-mūlyam asmābhir eva dāsyate |
GR14muktacau:247: tadā mayoktaṃ - viśākhaiva rādhā, rādhaiva viśākhā | tatas tan-mūlyaṃ viśākhaiva
GR14muktacau:248: dāsyatīti jñāyate | bhavatu tatra samāgraho nāsti, kintu yā khalu svayam āgatya na
GR14muktacau:249: gṛhṇāti tasyāś catur-guṇaṃ mūlyaṃ gṛhyatām | mauktikāni ca sādhāraṇāny eva
GR14muktacau:250: dīyantām iti me sarveṣāṃ sakhīnāṃ sudṛḍho nirṇayaḥ |
GR14muktacau:251: tad anu subalaṃ prati mayoktaṃ - sakhe subala! avacita muktā-pūrṇa-sampuṭān
GR14muktacau:252: ānīya purataḥ prasārya vicitya sarva-kaniṣṭhāny eva mauktikāni pūrvakṛtaṃ
GR14muktacau:253: tat-kārpaṇyam apy avigaṇayya prathamaṃ tat-kṛte viśākhāyāṃ samarpya tat-sakāśāc
GR14muktacau:254: ca tan-mūlyaṃ gṛhyatām | yadi vā prastutaṃ dātuṃ na śaknoti tatas tad-abhinneyam |
GR14muktacau:255: tāvat puṣpa-pravāla-corikā gopa-kanyakā yatra rakṣyante tatraivārān
GR14muktacau:257: tac chrutvā madhumaṅgalenoktaṃ - priya-vayasya | nirodhe'pi para-rāmābhiḥ
GR14muktacau:259: tadā mayoktaṃ - vayasya! mayāpy etad jñāyata eva | kintu cintā nāsti | yadyapi
GR14muktacau:260: para-rāmā-sparśo lajjā-tyāgaś cāsmad-vidhānāṃ svapne'py atīvāyogyas tathāpi -
GR14muktacau:261: sva-kāryam uddharet prājñaḥ kurvann api vigarhitaḥ |
GR14muktacau:263: āhāre vyavahāre ca lajjām api parityajet |
GR14muktacau:264: iti saṃhitā-vacana-balād aham eva prahariko bhavan sarvām eva rātriṃ jāgran
GR14muktacau:266: iti niśamya subalaḥ sa-smitam āha - puruṣottama! priya-sakhyā viśākhayā etāvati
GR14muktacau:268: tato mayoktaṃ - yad artham iyaṃ rakṣyate sā yāvat niḥśeṣaṃ mūlya-dravyaṃ
GR14muktacau:269: prasthāpayati | kiṃ vā kiyad-dravyaṃ gṛhītvā svayam evāgatya dhruvam asyāḥ
GR14muktacau:270: snehād ittham atra sthitvā avaśiṣṭa-dravyānayanārtham enāṃ prasthāpayati | tāvad
GR14muktacau:272: iti śrutvā madhumaṅgalaḥ prāha - sakhe! etad-goṣṭhīnām adhīśā sā sarvābhyo'pi
GR14muktacau:273: sarva-karmaṇi vicakṣaṇā viśeṣataḥ palāyane gavya-ghaṭṭyāṃ dānādiṣu sarvair
GR14muktacau:274: asmābhi punaḥ punaḥ prayakṣīkṛtāsti | tvaṃ tv aniśaam udghūrṇase tena me
GR14muktacau:276: tataḥ smitam apavāryāham avadaṃ - sakhe! alam anayā cintayā | tan-nikaṭe
GR14muktacau:277: mamodghūrṇā na janiṣyata eva | yadi vā jāyeta tarhi mad-uttamāṅgasya
GR14muktacau:281: mauktika-paṇa-nimittaka-vāg-vilāsam ullāsayiṣyāmi | yathā sukhena jāgaryām eva
GR14muktacau:282: catvāro rajani-yāmā drutam eva viramanti | athavā
GR14muktacau:286: iti śrutvā sarvāḥ smayamānā babhūvuḥ | rādhā tūdgrīvikayā māṃ viśākhāṃ
GR14muktacau:287: sarvāś ca sakhīr avalokayantī āha - candrāvalī-keli-kuraṅga! tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti
GR14muktacau:288: anuccair māṃ tarjayantī susmitāsīt | viśākhā tu kuṭila-dṛṣṭyā mām avalokayantī
GR14muktacau:289: āha - vraja-dhūrta-dhṛṣṭa! apehai apehīti vadantī sakhī-madhye līnā babhūva |
GR14muktacau:290: tataḥ sarvābhiḥ subalaṃ praty uktaṃ - subala! vidūṣakatāṃ tyaja | yadi bhavatāṃ
GR14muktacau:291: vikrayecchā vartate, tarhi muktāḥ pradarśya samucita-mūlyena pradīyantām | no
GR14muktacau:292: ced vayaṃ gṛhaṃ gacchāmaḥ | mathurāta eva mauktiāny ānayitavyāni |
GR14muktacau:293: iti niśamya subalena sampuṭānudghāṭya tābhyāṃ mauktikāni pradarśya māṃ praty
GR14muktacau:294: uktaṃ -- priya-vayasya! imāni mauktikāny amūlyāni ābhir gṛha-paty-ādikaṃ
GR14muktacau:295: samasta-godhanāni ca vikrīyāpi ekasyāpi mūlyaṃ dātum aśakyam | etāḥ khalu
GR14muktacau:296: bhavat-snigdhāḥ sarvān upekṣya tvāṃ jānanti | tasmād etat-pūrva-kṛta-kārpaṇyam
GR14muktacau:297: api vismṛtya māṃ ca tva-anugatam avekṣya yat-kiñcin-mūlyaṃ gṛhītvā vinā-mūlyena
GR14muktacau:298: dattavad āsām abhīpsita-mauktikāni dātum ājñā kriyatām |
GR14muktacau:299: tato'ham avocam - sakhe! nahi nahi | vayaṃ vāṇijya-vyavasāyinaḥ | bhavatu | kiṃ
GR14muktacau:300: kartavyaṃ | bhavad-vacanaṃ ca rakṣaṇīyam | tad yat kiñcid alpam eva mayā mṛgyate
GR14muktacau:301: tad dāpayitvaiva dīyantām | kiṃ ca utkocaṃ gṛhītvā bāraṃ bāraṃ mama
GR14muktacau:302: ghaṭṭī-dāna-dravyāṇi bhavatā vināśitāni sanītit mama kenāpi kathitam asti
GR14muktacau:303: tasmān mūlya-dravyaṃ samakṣam eva mayaivābhyo grahītavyam |
GR14muktacau:304: subalaḥ kiñcid vihasyāha - bhadraṃ vacaḥ | kiṃ ca etābhiḥ
GR14muktacau:305: svīya-svīyābhīpsita-mauktikāni vicitya pṛthak pṛthak kuṭī-kṛtāni dṛṣṭvā
GR14muktacau:307: tato'ham abruvam - bhadraṃ darśayantu sva-svābhīpsita-mauktikāni mūlyaṃ
GR14muktacau:309: subalaḥ prāha - priya-vayasya! etāḥ vinayena yan nivedayanti tat kṛpayāvadhārya
GR14muktacau:311: tato'haṃ - subala | kathyatāṃ kiṃ nivedayanti yuktaṃ cet kartavyam |
GR14muktacau:312: subalaḥ prāha - evaṃ nivedayanti, madhu-purī tāvad dūre
GR14muktacau:313: samagra-mūlya-dravyāṇāṃ ca samācayanaṃ dina-dvaya-madhya eva sampadyate |
GR14muktacau:314: gurukulaṃ tu mauktikālaṅkārādy-adarśanāt kṣaṇe kṣaṇe khidyamānaṃ bāḍham
GR14muktacau:315: ākrośati | ato'tisnigdhān bhavad-vidhān avagatya lajjām api parihāya
GR14muktacau:316: nirjana-vanāntaram āgatānām asmākam ṛṇenaiva mauktikāni dāpayitvā drutam
GR14muktacau:317: eva vidāyaḥ kriyatām | mūlya-dravyāṇy asmābhir bhavatām
GR14muktacau:318: abhīpsita-vṛddhi-sahitāni dina-dvayābhyantare pariśodhya praheyāṇi yady asmāsu
GR14muktacau:319: bhavad-vayasyasya pratītir na jāyate tadā tvam evāsmākaṃ pratibhūr bhaveti |
GR14muktacau:320: tasmāt parama-pratīti-pātrābhyaḥ santata-satyavādinībhya etābhyaḥ pratītiṃ kṛtvā
GR14muktacau:321: datteṣu mauktikeṣu mūlya-dravyam abhīpsita-vṛddhiś cācirāl lapsyate | tathaitābhiḥ
GR14muktacau:323: tato'haṃ vihasya - subala! tvaṃ śuddha-buddho'si | āsāṃ vyavahṛtiḥ kiñcin mātrāpi
GR14muktacau:324: tvayā na jñāyate | kuṭi-nāṭī-nāī̀oikā-nartakya imā mauktikaṃ gṛhītvā
GR14muktacau:326: praviśya dravyam adattvā yadi khelyantyas tiṣṭheyus tarhi tvayā kiṃ kartavyam |
GR14muktacau:327: subalaḥ prāha - sakhe! maivaṃ bravīḥ | etāḥ khalu naivaṃ kariṣyanti | yadi vā
GR14muktacau:328: kuryus tadojjvala-vanāntārjuna-kokilādibhiḥ saha tatra gatvā svayam ābhiḥ
GR14muktacau:330: etāsāṃ bhartṛṣu saṃśrāvya tat-prāpty-arthaṃ tebhyas tathā bhayaṃ
GR14muktacau:331: pradarśayiṣyāmi | yathā ta eva drutam amūs tvat-samīpaṃ prasthāpya tad
GR14muktacau:333: tan niśamya madhumaṅgalena sa-krodham uktaṃ - re subala! tvaṃ nāmnaiva subalaḥ
GR14muktacau:334: pumāṃś cāsi | vastutas tv abalākṛtir muhur dṛṣṭo'si | yataḥ sāmpratam apy āsām
GR14muktacau:335: abalānāṃ phutkāraṃ kṣudrād atikṣudratareṣu tad-bhartṛṣu kartuṃ yad icchasi |
GR14muktacau:336: tad-bhīru-svabhāvasya tavaitat samucitam eva | tasmāt tvam evātropaviśya mayaiva
GR14muktacau:337: vijayādidhāṭīṃ pragṛhya balād āsāṃ bhartṛ-sahita-go-mahiṣyādikaṃ veṣṭayitvā
GR14muktacau:338: samānīya ruddhvātra nadīśvara-pure rakṣiṣyate | tadā tā eva svayam āgatya
GR14muktacau:339: sva-sva-dravyaṃ sutarāṃ dattvā svaṃ svaṃ patiṃ godhanādikaṃ ca mocayiṣyanti |
GR14muktacau:341: madhumaṅgala! katham evaṃ tvayā mantryate ? vraja-vāsino bhilla-pulindādyā api
GR14muktacau:342: me priyebhyo'py adhika-priyāḥ | ete tu sa-gotrāḥ sahodarā mad-abhinnā eva |
GR14muktacau:343: tasmād etan-mantraṇam atīvānucitam | subala-bhāṣitam eva kiñcid bhāti | tathāpi
GR14muktacau:344: na priya-janaiḥ samam ādāna-pradāna-prayogeṇa rasa-rakṣā na jāyata eva | tathā
GR14muktacau:346: naivādānaṃ pradānaṃ hi mitraiḥ saha vitanyate |
GR14muktacau:347: kṛte prītyā bhavel lopaḥ kalahas tad-anantaram || iti |
GR14muktacau:348: tataḥ prastutam eva mūlyaṃ dattvā mauktikāni nayantu |
GR14muktacau:349: tac chrutvā sa-krodham iva subalaṃ nibhālya - aye! kauṭilya-pāraṅgata subala!
GR14muktacau:350: sarvair eva militvā viḍambayitum eva vayam atrānītā bhavatā | tad yūyaṃ
GR14muktacau:351: mauktika-vāṇijya-vyavasāyena rājyaṃ kuruta | vayaṃ calitāḥ sma ity uktvā
GR14muktacau:352: calantīnāṃ tāsāṃ savidham āsādya sauhārdam abhivyañjayan subalo lalitāṃ nīcaiḥ
GR14muktacau:353: prāha - sakhi lalite! ādāna-pradāna-vyavahārasya sneha-bhaṅga-kāritvāt kevalaĪa
GR14muktacau:354: tad-bhayenaiva priya-vayasyena mūlya-nirṇayaṃ prastuta-vitta-lābhaṃ ca vinā
GR14muktacau:355: sarvathaiva mauktikāni na deyānīit sarva-prakāreṇāvadhāritam | tasmāt samāgatya
GR14muktacau:356: prathamaṃ tāvan mūlyam eva nirṇīyatām | tad-dānopāyaḥ paścāc cintanīyaḥ ity
GR14muktacau:357: anunayena tāḥ parāvṛtya mat-samīpam ānīya māṃ praty uvāca - vayasya! narma
GR14muktacau:358: hitvā mūlyam eva tāvat kathyatām |tato'ham -- sakhe subala! prathamaṃ tāvat
GR14muktacau:360: subalaḥ prāha - etāsāṃ madhye lalitaiva mukhyā tad etad gṛhīta-mauktika-mūlyaṃ
GR14muktacau:362: tato'haṃ kiñcid vihasya - etad-vāhinīnāṃ pravīṇayā lalitayā samare pauruṣeṇa yadi
GR14muktacau:363: mādṛśaḥ puruṣa-siṃhaḥ sakṛd api kuṇṭhitāstrīkartuṃ śakyate | tadāsyāḥ samakṣaṃ
GR14muktacau:364: sarvathaivāstrī na bhaviṣyāmi | kiṃ vā santatam amuktāstrī bhūtvā etaṃ puaruṣam
GR14muktacau:365: evānukīrtayann imām evānucariṣyāmīti idam eva yat kiñcin mūlyaṃ dattvā
GR14muktacau:370: govardhana-girir yena vyadhāyi tenoccaṇḍena bhavatā samam abaleyaṃ
GR14muktacau:372: madhumaṅgalaḥ prāha - subala! taṃ kathaṃ pūrvam asya paugaṇḍa-kṛtaṃ darpam
GR14muktacau:376: madhumaṅgalaḥ - yad anena pūrvārīṇāṃ sakalānāṃ pūrvaṃ yādṛśa-vaikalyaṃ
GR14muktacau:377: kāritam āsīt, sāmpratam etad durgamaṃ tad-dhṛdayaṅgamāna-tanu-parvatān
GR14muktacau:378: abhilīlayaiva kena ca nakharāstreṇaiva khaṇḍa-khaṇḍīkṛtya mahāmārādibhis
GR14muktacau:380: tato'haṃ vihasya - subala! satyam anyatra mayā tādṛśenaiva bhūyate | na tv etasyāḥ
GR14muktacau:381: purataḥ yasmāt tato'pi pravara-vigrahe vividha-vaicitrī-pravīṇayānayā bāraṃ bāraṃ
GR14muktacau:382: bhrū-dhanuṣ-ṭaṅkāreṇaiva huṅkāreṇa helayā stabdhīkṛto'smi | tat katham iyam
GR14muktacau:384: ity ākarṇanena smera-mukhīḥ sakhīr avalokya svānandottha-vikārān avagūhya
GR14muktacau:385: sakrodham iva lalitayoktaṃ - aye subala vidūṣaka! madhumaṅgala-sahacarasya
GR14muktacau:386: gokula-bhaṇḍasya bhaṇḍatā-devyā satyaṃ tvam apy āviṣṭo'si | yad asmān
GR14muktacau:387: etat-samakṣaṃ samānāyya viḍambana-samudre saṃpātayan kautukaṃ paśyann asaīti
GR14muktacau:388: nigadya kuṭila-dṛṣṭyā mām ākṣipantīm āgacchata bhoḥ saralāḥ! āgacchatety
GR14muktacau:389: uktvā sarvābhiḥ saha gacchantīṃ tad avasara eva tatrāgatā bhagavatyāḥ
GR14muktacau:390: paurṇamāsyā antevāsinī nāndīmukhī tad-gamana-vārtām akhilāṃ sarvābhyaḥ
GR14muktacau:391: samavadhārya vyājahāra - sakhi lalite! narma-śālino'sya śrī-vrajendra-nandanasya
GR14muktacau:392: parihāsa-vāṅ-mātreṇaiva sva-kāryam upekṣya katham apayānty asi ? kṣaṇaṃ mayā
GR14muktacau:394: apamānaṃ puraskṛtya mānaṃ kṛtvā tu pṛṣṭhataḥ |
GR14muktacau:395: sva-kāryam uddharet prājñaḥ kārya-dhvaṃso hi mūrkhatā ||
GR14muktacau:396: ity ādi-nyāyena parihāsa-viḍambanāni soḍhvā sthairyam ālambya sva-kāryam
GR14muktacau:397: uddhara | kiṃ ca mayā śapathaṃ kṛtvā vyāhriyate | asya narmabhir eva lagnakair iva
GR14muktacau:399: abhimāna-śālino'sya narma-prayogo na sambhavati | tad anyasyā mauktika-mūlyaṃ
GR14muktacau:400: śrutvā yat kṛte bhadraṃ syāt tad eva vyavahartavyam iti balād iva tāṃ haste gṛhītvā
GR14muktacau:401: sarvābhiḥ saha muktākuṭa-nikaṭam ānīya māṃ pratyuktavatī gokula-yuvarāja!
GR14muktacau:402: tatra-bhavatyā bhagavatyā śubhāśīḥ śata-pūrvakaṃ bhavantaṃ prati kiñcit
GR14muktacau:404: tato'haṃ -- nāndīmukhi! kuśalam āste tatra-bhavatī bhagavatī ? tat kathyatāṃ kim
GR14muktacau:406: nāndīmukhī -- imā vatsā rādhādayo vraja-kumārikā asmākam atīva
GR14muktacau:407: sneha-pātrāṇi āyuṣmati bhavaty api santataṃ paramānuraktāḥ | tad asmān vīkṣya
GR14muktacau:408: atyāgrahaṃ vimucya āsāṃ dātuṃ śakyamāna-mūlyam ādāya maāṣṭa-nidhi-pater
GR14muktacau:409: vrajendrasya kumāreṇa bhavatā etad abhīṣṭa-mauktikāni dattvā vayaṃ
GR14muktacau:410: santoṣaṇīyā iti bhagavatyāḥ sandeśam imam avakalayya narmāṇi parityajya
GR14muktacau:413: tato'haṃ sa-ślāghaṃ - nāndīmukhi! pūrvaṃ subala-hastena tat-prahitājñā-kusumaṃ
GR14muktacau:414: śirasi nidhāya samagrame eva parityajya lalitā-mauktikānāṃ yaḥ kaścana
GR14muktacau:415: mūlyābhāso'nayā saha nirṇīto'sti tam asyā mukhato niśamya tato yat tvayā tyājyate
GR14muktacau:417: ity ākarṇya sakampādharaṃ bhruvaṃ kuṭilayantīṃ lalitāṃ sarvāś ca smita-mukhīr
GR14muktacau:418: avalokayantī nāndīmukhī smita-pūrvakam evāha - vraja-yuva-rāja! sa imābhyaḥ
GR14muktacau:419: śruto'sti, kintu tādṛṅ narma parihāya amat-samakṣam anyāsāṃ sarvāsām eva
GR14muktacau:421: tato mayoktaṃ - nāndīmukhi! āsāṃ sarvato jyāyasī jyeṣṭhā tad asyā
GR14muktacau:422: mauktika-mūlyam anayā saha vicārya tvayaiva kathyatām |
GR14muktacau:423: nāndīmukhī - vitta-svāminaiva mūlyaṃ prathamaṃ kathanīyam | tat svayam eva
GR14muktacau:425: tato'haṃ - niśāpater mama hṛdayākāśa-vīthyām uditāyāṃ rādhāyām udayantyām
GR14muktacau:426: anurādhāyāṃ sva-maryādām unmucya tayor madhye rāgeṇodayantī jyeṣṭhā
GR14muktacau:427: man-mukha-candraṃ tābhyāṃ saha vā pṛthag vā manāg api sva-mukhena
GR14muktacau:429: tatas tan niśamya nikuñjāntaritāyāṃ rādhāyāṃ lalitā-viśākhā-jyeṣṭhāsu ca tisṛṣu
GR14muktacau:431: sva-sva-mahā-lābha-karam api bhāṣitam avadhārya katham etāḥ krudhyanti ?
GR14muktacau:433: asmākam etat-para-puruṣasya satīnām asmākam etat para-puruṣasya
GR14muktacau:434: mukha-candra-cumbana-karaṇaṃ dūre tāvad āstāṃ sparśo'pi mahā-pāpāyaiveti
GR14muktacau:436: ityādi vinoda-līlām ākarṇya satyabhāmā kṛṣṇam āha - nātha! tārā-gaṇane
GR14muktacau:437: rādhāyā viśākheti-prasiddham api nāma hitvā sākūtam anurādheti nāma
GR14muktacau:438: prayuñjatas tan-narmālāpa-bhaṅgīṃ svasmin svasminn evāvadhārayantyos tayor
GR14muktacau:439: vidagdha-rādhā-viśākhayor nyāyya eva roṣaḥ | lalitā kathaṃ kupyati ?
GR14muktacau:441: satyabhāmā - yādavendra! etad apūrva-līlā-kathā-śravaṇena mama manasi tṛptir
GR14muktacau:442: alaṃ vṛttir nāsti tat kathaya kathaya |
GR14muktacau:444: gṛhīta-muktā-kūṭaṃ hastena cālayann idam avadaṃ - nāndīmukhi! iyaṃ te
GR14muktacau:445: priya-sakhī campakalatā kasmād api siddhāt prāpta-siddhir iti mayā bahu-dinam
GR14muktacau:448: mayoktaṃ - yata iyaṃ campakavallī sthāvarā madhye bṛhat-phala-dvaya-bhārānatāpi
GR14muktacau:449: līlayā caṅkramīti | ato mudira-sundare mad-urasi campaka-mālā bhūtvā
GR14muktacau:450: sva-saurabha-bhareṇa māṃ vāsayatu | mayāpi sva-siddhi-balāt etad-ājñayaivāsyāḥ
GR14muktacau:453: subalaḥ - priya-sakhe! caṅkramaṇādinā'syāḥ siddhiḥ sarvair anubhūyata eva | tava
GR14muktacau:454: tu kenāpi kadāpi kutrāpi sā naiva dṛṣṭāsti | tasmād duṣkare'smin karmaṇi
GR14muktacau:455: sahasaiva pravṛttena bhavatā aydi niṣpādayitum aśakyaṃ syāt tarhi vayam ābhir
GR14muktacau:457: tato'haṃ - subala! mama siddhiṃ paśyann api na paśyasi ? mayā kiṃ kartavyam ?
GR14muktacau:458: nāndīmukhī - madhurāṅga | kadā kutra kā siddhis tvayā niṣpāditāsti | sā
GR14muktacau:460: tato mayoktaṃ - deva-yātrāyām ambikā-vane śaraṇāgatatvena tāta-pādayoḥ patitaṃ
GR14muktacau:462: vidyādhara-rājo mayā vyadhāyi | girīndra-rājo govardhanaś ca saptāham
GR14muktacau:464: subalādi-vayasya-gaṇaḥ sva-dṛṣṭi-mātreṇaiva sa-cetanaḥ sphuṭam akāri | bāraṃ
GR14muktacau:465: bāraṃ mahādāvānalo'py amṛtīkṛtya sukhenaiva sphuṭam apāyi | evam ādayo
GR14muktacau:466: bahavaḥ siddhi-prabhāvā gokule kena nānubhūtāḥ santi ? tad ativistareṇālam |
GR14muktacau:467: iti niśamya īṣat-smayamānā lalitā prāha - nāndīmukhi! eṣa te durlalito nāgaraḥ
GR14muktacau:468: sarvam etat satyaṃ kathayati | kintu sa kālo gataḥ | yatra brahmacarya-balena tat
GR14muktacau:473: tato'haṃ kiñcid vihasya - lalite! tejīyasāṃ na doṣāya vahneḥ sarva-bhujo yathā ity
GR14muktacau:474: asya padyasyārtham abuddhaiva tvyedam ucyate | tat-tad-arthaḥ śrūyatāṃ | yathā
GR14muktacau:475: sarva-bhakṣaṇenāpi vahnes tejo-glānir na bhavet | pratyuta tad-vṛddhir mahaty eva
GR14muktacau:479: madhumaṅgalah -- lalite! satyaṃ bravīti priya-vayasyaḥ | siddhiś cen na vṛddhim
GR14muktacau:480: āyāti tarhi muktaḥ kathaṃ bhūmau prārohanti ? prārūḍhāś ca kathaṃ sarvataḥ
GR14muktacau:481: prasāriṇyā vallikā bhavantyaḥ pracurataraṃ phullanti phalanti ca ?
GR14muktacau:482: lalitā vihasya - ārya madhumaṅgala! tat kiṃ bhavat-priya-vayasyasya siddheḥ
GR14muktacau:486: rādhā svagataṃ - lalite! etat kāminī-saṅgasya cety ucyatām iti rādhayoktaṃ
GR14muktacau:488: tato'haṃ - tat katham atraiva bhavatībhir upta-muktā hiṃsrā jātāḥ ?
GR14muktacau:489: lalitā - bho vidagdha-śiromaṇe! muktāḥ kiṃ hiṃsrā bhavanti ?
GR14muktacau:492: rādhā svagataṃ - lalite! kṣetrasyāsya guṇād apy ucyatām ity etad viśākhāpy
GR14muktacau:494: nāndīmukhī - lalite! satyam eva kathayati viśākhā |
GR14muktacau:498: -mahā-kṣetre'smin vṛndāvane dhruvam āgantukā ye kecana jantavo bhaktā eva
GR14muktacau:500: lalitā vihasya - viśākhe | sphuṭaṃ kāminī-saṅgasya iti bhavad-vāg-vilāso'pi
GR14muktacau:502: viśākhā - ārūḍha-yogo'pi nipātyate'dhaḥ-saṅgena yogī kim utālpa-siddhir iti
GR14muktacau:503: nyāyenāsya kāye manasi gotre ca śyāmalatarasya sa-cchidra-vaṃśī-rasikasya
GR14muktacau:504: kṣaṇa-mātra-saṅgena muktā api bhūmau garbha-vāsena jananam āsādya
GR14muktacau:506: tato'haṃ - viśākhe! nikhilam eva satyaṃ kathayasi |
GR14muktacau:511: aṅgīkṛtya vraja-vilāsinyo bhūtvā susāra-vaidagdhyādi-guṇair āvṛtya etā iva
GR14muktacau:512: mad-urasi sraja iva vilasanti | tathaivāpare parama-muktā api mad-acintya-guṇair
GR14muktacau:514: paśu-pakṣi-bhūruhādayo bhūtvā mām ānandayantaḥ paramānandam āsvādayanto
GR14muktacau:517: lalitā kiñcid vihasya - mahā-siddhaś ced bhūmi-bheda-guṇaṃ vinā tava siddheḥ
GR14muktacau:518: prabhāvān muktā jāyante tarhi parama-siddho'pi bhavān
GR14muktacau:520: tato'haṃ - mūrkhe lalitike! yauvana-dhana-garvitābhir bhavatībhir yathā
GR14muktacau:521: sva-dharmaṃ parityajya itas tataś cañcalyate tathā svadharma-pariniṣṭha-vaiśya
GR14muktacau:522: śiromaṇi-śrī-vraja-rājasya eka-putreṇa mayāpi svadharmaṃ parityajya kim
GR14muktacau:523: ucchṛṅkhalena bhavitavyam ? yataḥ kṛṣi-vāṇijya-go-rakṣā-kuśīdaṃ tūryam ucyate
GR14muktacau:524: iti vaiśyānām asmākaṃ catasro vṛttayo bhavanti | āsām eka-vṛttyācaraṇenaiva
GR14muktacau:525: sarva-siddher vṛddhis tac-catuṣṭayam ācarato mama punaḥ siddhiḥ
GR14muktacau:528: kṛṣi-vāṇijya-gorakṣā-tisro vṛttayaḥ spaṣṭam anubhūyanta eva vṛddhi-jīvikā tu
GR14muktacau:530: tato'haṃ - nāndīmukhi! sāpy asmābhiḥ kriyamāṇāpi tvayā kiṃ na jñāyate ?
GR14muktacau:534: viśākhā kiñcid vihasya - subala! yatra yo rajyati, sa khalu vinindyam api tad eva
GR14muktacau:535: ślāghyatayotkīrtayati | atas tāvat suṣṭhu adharmasyāpi śobhanatvena varṇanam
GR14muktacau:537: subalo vihasya - nāndīmukhi! na kevalam asau dhanasya vṛddhiṃ labhate, kintv
GR14muktacau:538: anyeṣāṃ padārthānām api kṣaṇe kṣaṇe vṛddhiṃ labhamāno'sti ||
GR14muktacau:542: madhumaṅgalaḥ - subala! itara-padārthānāṃ vṛddhiṃ kiṃ tvayā vismṛtā ?
GR14muktacau:547: lalitā - ārya! anyataraika-vastunaḥ kathaṃ vṛddhiṃ saṅgopitavān asi |
GR14muktacau:550: rādhā sa-smitaṃ - lalite! satyaṃ satyaṃ vapur ākhyāti bhojanam ity etat
GR14muktacau:559: yenāsya sakalāntaram apy abhivyāpya vilasitam iti tan mṛduu-bhāṣitāmṛtaṃ
GR14muktacau:563: pracuratara-vṛddhiṃ pratiśrāvya mauktikāny ādāya jaṭilādi-durgam āsthāya
GR14muktacau:564: mūlam api na dāsyanti | vṛddhi-vārtā tu dūre vartatām iti suṣṭhu vijñāyāhaṃ
GR14muktacau:565: mitreṇa hitam āśāṃsanīyam iti vijñāpayann asmi | agre tubhyaṃ yad rocate |
GR14muktacau:566: tato'haṃ daśanai rasanāṃ sandaśya - sakhe! imā gāndharvādayaḥ kulāṅganāḥ
GR14muktacau:567: prakāmādāna-pradāne mahā-śucayas tad ajānataiva tvayedam ucyate tac chrūyatāṃ
GR14muktacau:568: sāmpratam eva svādharāmṛtopaḍhaukanena mām atīva santoṣya gāndharvayā
GR14muktacau:570: paribhūṣya mad-urasi tad eva caturguṇīkṛtya sāyam eva vitīrṇam | lalitayā ca
GR14muktacau:571: paraśvaḥ sāyam amṛta-srāvi-cumbaka-ratnam ekam ādāya kali-krameṇa
GR14muktacau:573: man-madhurādharāmṛtam ādāya sva-sarva-bhūtaṃ tad eva prātar bahu-guṇīkṛtya
GR14muktacau:574: pradāya bāḍham āpyāyito'smi | campaka-latādayaś ca bāraṃ bāraṃ
GR14muktacau:576: triguṇīkṛtya pradāya mām atīva santoṣitavatyaḥ | kintu āsu jana-dvayī kevalaṃ
GR14muktacau:581: mat-kara-mardana-phala-dvayaṃ gṛhītvā sakṛd eva tad-arpitaṃ avaiśiṣṭaṃ
GR14muktacau:582: dvir-arpaṇaṃ gati-kriyām ācarya nādyāpi karoti | kācid anyā raṅgaṇamālā-sahacarī
GR14muktacau:583: tulasī nāmnī dviguṇīkṛtya dātum uktvā mad-eka-parirambha-stavakaṃ samādāya
GR14muktacau:584: sāmpratam idānīṃ deyaṃ tadānīṃ deyam iti kālaṃ kṣapayantī mūlam api na
GR14muktacau:588: bhavad-vidhāsu priyam eva vakti | tathāpy etādṛśe'py asmin vañcana-cāturīm
GR14muktacau:589: ācarantībhyāṃ bhavatībhyāṃ kṛtaghnatvāt loka-dharmato bhayaṃ na kriyate |
GR14muktacau:590: tad ākarṇya cāru hasantī lalitā prāha - sakhyus tavārya madhumaṅgala! bhāṣitaṃ
GR14muktacau:591: tat pīyūṣataḥ priyataraṃ nahi kasya goṣṭhe pratyakṣaraṃ pratipadaṃ
GR14muktacau:592: tad-alīkatogra-śakrāśanasya nahi ced iha bhūri-gandhaḥ | tataḥ sahāsa-kolāhalaṃ
GR14muktacau:593: sādhu lalite! sādhu varṇitam iti sarvās tās tām āliṅgatavatyaḥ | rādhā ca tathaiva
GR14muktacau:595: nāndīmukhī - mohana! katham apratītiḥ kriyate ? lalitā-prema-pātrīyaṃ
GR14muktacau:596: raṅgaṇa-mālikā, dvitīyā ca viśākhā-priya-śiṣyā tad etābhyām eva te prbodhya tad
GR14muktacau:597: avaśyaṃ dāpayiṣyate | yathā tābhyāṃ saha bhavataḥ śuddha-bhāvena punaḥ punar
GR14muktacau:598: eṣa vyavahāro nirvahati | yadi vā dāpayituṃ na śakyate tadā tad-avaśiṣṭa-dravyaṃ
GR14muktacau:599: tat-snehāt tābhyāṃ svayam eva dāpyate | ete api yadi te jhaṭiti dātuṃ nāṅgīkurutas
GR14muktacau:600: tarhi kenāpi bhavān anuyoktuṃ na śakyate | bhavatā tv
GR14muktacau:601: anaṅga-mañjarī-sahodarāgrataḥ kriyamāṇa eva phutkārārambhe tābhyām eva
GR14muktacau:602: sādhvasena svīkṛta-vṛddhi-sahitaṃ tad drutaṃ sutarāṃ vitariṣyate |
GR14muktacau:603: tataḥ sarvāsu nāndīmukhīṃ māṃ ca sa-bhrū-kuṭi-kauṭilyam īkṣamāṇāsu kiñcid
GR14muktacau:604: upasṛtya tuṅgavidyā sāntaḥ-smitam āha - bho bhoḥ sakhyaḥ! apūrvaikā vārtā
GR14muktacau:608: lalitā - paramparayā śruto'sti bhadreṇa na jñāyate |
GR14muktacau:610: sandhi-catuṣṭayākhyāta-kṛd-vṛttaya iti vyākhyātāś catasro vṛttayo yāḥ kṛtāḥ santi
GR14muktacau:612: viśākhā -- viṣṇu viṣṇu tad-vṛtti-darśanaṃ tāvad-dūre'stu sa eva kadāpi na
GR14muktacau:614: lalitā sākūtaṃ - tuṅgavidye! kutrāsau tvayā paricitaḥ ?
GR14muktacau:618: tuṅgavidyā - nikāma-vanyāvṛddhi-sāmarthyena | ity ākarṇya sarvāḥ smitaṃ
GR14muktacau:622: narma-pañjikā̆ā̆aṃ kraya-vikraya-pañjikāṃ ca vidhāya sāmpratam alīka-pañjikā
GR14muktacau:623: tathādāna-pradāna-pañjikā ca prapañcitā anukrameṇa nāmnāntareṇa ca
GR14muktacau:625: lalitā - atha kiṃ so'pi suṣṭhu anubhūyamāno'sti |
GR14muktacau:627: kuhaka-bhaṭṭena tad-vrtti-catuṣṭayasya ṭīkā yugapat-kartum ārabdhāḥ santi |
GR14muktacau:628: campakalatā - tuṅgavidye! tvaṃ sarva-vidyā-viśāradāsi tad eṣāṃ catūrṇāṃ
GR14muktacau:630: viśākhā - ācārya-bhaṭṭayor arthaḥ spaṣṭa eva tan-miśra-paṇḍitayoḥ sa tāvan
GR14muktacau:632: tuṅgavidyā vihasya - doṣo'py asti guṇo'py asti tena miśrena miśreta iti miśraḥ |
GR14muktacau:633: nāndīmukhī - kataro vā doṣaḥ kataro vā gunaḥ ?
GR14muktacau:634: tuṅgavidyā - vaidagdhyāvaidagdhayor avicāreṇaiva yatra kutrāpi sarvatra pravṛttir
GR14muktacau:635: iti doṣaḥ | sāralyādhikyena uttamānuttamāvicāreṇaiva vaiṣamyaṃ vinā sarvatra
GR14muktacau:637: lalitā smitvā - tad asyaitan-miśratā padavī samucitaiva |
GR14muktacau:639: tuṅgavidyā - sad-asad-vicārikā buddhiḥ paṇḍā | tayā yuktaḥ paṇḍitaḥ iti | ayaṃ tu
GR14muktacau:640: buddhi-gauraveṇa pūrva-parayoḥ para-vidhir balavān iti vicārya parā asad-vicārikā
GR14muktacau:641: yā sā paṇḍā tām evottaramtveāśritas tad-yuktatvāt paṇḍita iti |
GR14muktacau:642: citrā - sakhi tuṅgavidye! sandhyādi-catuṣṭayasyāpy arthaḥ prakāśya kathyatām |
GR14muktacau:643: tuṅgavidyā - citre! asmad-goṣṭhyāṃ tat-prapañcena lalitaiva dakṣā tat saiva
GR14muktacau:645: lalitā - citre! etat-prasaṅga-leśo'pi mayā kadāpi na śruto'pi tad
GR14muktacau:647: citrā - tuṅgavidye! mac-chirasā śāpitāsi tvayaiva vyākhyāyatām |
GR14muktacau:648: tato'tilajjayā svayam asaṃkathya rādhikātiprīti-pātrīṃ manāg apy anucyamānāṃ
GR14muktacau:650: cakṣuḥ-kūṇanena sa-smitam ālokayantyāṃ tuṅgavidyāyāṃ, tuṅganarmā kiñcit
GR14muktacau:651: sannidhāya sa-smita-man-mukham avalokayantī nijagāda - citre! sa tāvad
GR14muktacau:652: artho'smābhir na jñāyate kintu tayāpsarasā punaḥ punar āgatya sa-vinayaṃ svayam
GR14muktacau:656: prathamaṃ śṛṇu dūtī-dvārā vā kṛtābhiyogena yūnor milanaṃ sandhiḥ | tasya vṛttir
GR14muktacau:659: catuṣṭayam eva catuṣṭayam | tasya tasya vṛttir nakha-kṣatādiḥ,
GR14muktacau:665: asmat-karṇa-gocarīkṛtaṃ, bhavatyā tat kṛd-vṛtter apy arthaḥ suṣṭhu nirucyatām |
GR14muktacau:666: tuṅganarmā -- ānandaṃ karotīti ānanda-kṛt sambhogaḥ | tasya vṛttiḥ
GR14muktacau:667: śītkāra-cakṣr nirmīlanādir iti | kiṃ ca kānta-darpācāryādy-avatāriṇā
GR14muktacau:670: prakaṭam anigadya bhaṅgyā nāma-dheyāntareṇa ca yat kiñcit nigūhitaṃ tad
GR14muktacau:673: campakalatā kiñcid vihasya - tuṅgavidye! etad-bhaṭṭa-pādānāṃ tvāv eva bhujau
GR14muktacau:674: tatrāpy atīva sukumārau tat katham ekadaiva ṭīkā-catuṣṭayaṃ lekhituṃ śaknotu |
GR14muktacau:682: viśākhā - lalite! satyam etat sarvam asyakuhaka-bala-vijṛmbhitam eva yat
GR14muktacau:683: priya-sakhyā saha gadya-padyair narmālāpa-goṣṭhyāṃ tāṃ jetuṃ
GR14muktacau:684: nija-kuhaka-pāṇḍityena samprati vṛddhi-vṛttim ācaratā pada-dvayasya vṛddhiḥ
GR14muktacau:685: kadācid yad anena kriyate tac cāsmābhir api dṛṣṭam asti |
GR14muktacau:686: sudevī - viśākhe! caturṇām eteṣāṃ śāstra-kāriṇāṃ prāyeṇaika eva vyavasāyaḥ
GR14muktacau:688: nāndīmukhī - sudevi! etad vivaraṇam alpākṣareṇa tuṅganarmaṇā yad akāri tat kiṃ
GR14muktacau:690: sudevī - yāva-grāma-stha-priya-sakhyāṃ tadānīṃ datta-manaskayā mayā tat
GR14muktacau:691: samyaktayā nāvadhāritaṃ tat kṛpayā tvayaiva vistareṇa saṃkathya śrāvyatām |
GR14muktacau:692: nāndīmukhī - sudevi! śrūyatām | vastuta ete catvāraḥ kuhaka-bhaṭṭa-nāmā eka
GR14muktacau:693: eva kumāro bhavati | sa eva kṛtya-bheda-vinoda-sampādanāyātmanaḥ
GR14muktacau:695: iti apareṇa śyāmala-miśra iti padavīm adhyārūḍho vartate | alīka-rāja-paṇḍitena
GR14muktacau:696: samaṃ tu sphuṭam asya pṛthag-vigrahatā nāsty eva kintv ayam eva sadā dharmī
GR14muktacau:700: tato'haṃ - haṃho! yac caturbhujatvādika-līlāyitam akhilam asmābhiḥ
GR14muktacau:701: siddhatā-prabhāvair evāvirbhāvyate | tan mūrkhābhir ābhir ugrābhiḥ
GR14muktacau:703: iti mad-vacaḥ samākarṇya sarvāḥ - anena siddha-gosvāminā sva-prabhāveṇa
GR14muktacau:704: nijālīkatāpi siddhī-sampādya sva-mukhenaiva paraṃ nirdhāritā vyadhāyīti sarvair
GR14muktacau:706: ahaṃ svagataṃ - bho āścaryam āścaryam amūbhir vāvadūka-ballavībhir
GR14muktacau:707: vacana-prakāśa-paripāṭībhir bāḍham alīkataiva mayi siddhīkṛteti manasi vibhāvya
GR14muktacau:708: lajjayā mayā tad-anākarṇita-mudrayaiva tāḥ suṣṭhv avadhāryeva kiñcid vihasya
GR14muktacau:709: vyāhṛtaṃ - bho mugdhā yauvanāndhā vilāsinyaḥ! yady atra nahi vaḥ pratītis tarhi
GR14muktacau:710: sarveṣāṃ samakṣam eva sva-siddhiṃ darśayan prathamam asyāḥ kaṇṭhe vana-mālā
GR14muktacau:711: bhavāni iti vihasya campakalatām upasarpan - vayasya siddhasya tava
GR14muktacau:712: para-ramaṇī-sparśaḥ parama-nyāyya iti vihasya vadatā madhumaṅgalena
GR14muktacau:713: nivartito'ham avadaṃ - sakhe! siddhasya siddhayā saṃyogo mithaḥ
GR14muktacau:714: paramānanda-lābhāyaiva bhavati | uktaṃ ca śrī-nāradena - paramānanda-lābhāya
GR14muktacau:717: bhaneevācchādayantī campakalatā prapalāyya kuñjāntarāle praviṣṭā rādhāṃ
GR14muktacau:719: tato'haṃ citrāṃ mauktikāni haste cālayann uktavān - citre! samakṣam āgatya
GR14muktacau:721: tat-sādhanāni bahūni santīti tvat-prāṇa-preṣṭha-sakhyā kathitam asti | tair
GR14muktacau:722: vicitra-śṛṅgāreṇa mat-pratyaṅgāni tathā bhūṣaya yathāham api
GR14muktacau:725: tac chravaṇataḥ sa-krodhaṃ citrā - aye aviratam
GR14muktacau:728: tat-tat-sādhana-karma-karmaṭhābhis tābhir eva sa-santoṣaṃ sucitritena bhavatā tā
GR14muktacau:729: eva suślāghaṃ suvareṇa santatam anukīrtyantāṃ itas tvaritam apasaratu svāmī |
GR14muktacau:730: ity ākarṇanena jāta-hāsāḥ sarvās tāṃ suṣṭhu tuṣṭuvuḥ |
GR14muktacau:734: marma-vraṇa-vedanā-vahni-jvālitānīva sphuṭanti santi | tatas tan-nidānam avaśyaṃ
GR14muktacau:735: kṛpayā prakāśyatām | yathā bhagavatī-dvārā tat-pratīkāraṃ jhaṭiti niṣpādya
GR14muktacau:737: iti nāndīmukhī-vacanam ākarṇya savaiklavyam iva mayoktaṃ -- nāndīmukhi
GR14muktacau:754: mahyaṃ svayam āhūyāsaṅkocatayā mat-kāmita-pratyaṅga-sevā yat tayā na dīyate |
GR14muktacau:755: atas tasya mayi madhurāṃ prītim anavadhārya tat-pūrṇāṃśāṃ yathārtha-nāmnīṃ
GR14muktacau:757: gurutvenāsādyāsyāḥ sakāśāt mahādevī-mantra-rājaṃ didīkṣiṣur ahaṃ tvāṃ
GR14muktacau:759: nāndīmukhī vihasya | sulakṣaṇa prathamaṃ tāvat śāstra-nirṇīta-gurūpasattir
GR14muktacau:761: mayoktam | bhadraṃ vacaḥ prathamaṃ guru-śiṣyayoḥ parīkṣaiva nyāyyā | tatas
GR14muktacau:762: tisras triyāmāḥ kutrāpi nirjana-kuñje kṣaṇe mahilāṃ kṣaṇe pumāṃsaṃ māṃ
GR14muktacau:763: sampādya sva-vidyāyāḥ prabhāvam asau darśayatu | tato viśrabhya
GR14muktacau:772: mṛgamadena mad-vakṣasi mahā-devī-nāma-mudrām abhilikhya bāhu-dvayaṃ ca
GR14muktacau:774: uttārya mat-kaṇṭhe nidhāya mama vakṣaḥ-pārśvayoḥ sva-kucau aṃsa-dvaye
GR14muktacau:775: bāhulate mukhe ca svādharaṃ aparāṅgānyāgamānabhijñena mayā sphuṭam
GR14muktacau:776: ajñātāny api paramāgamācāryeyaṃ svayaṃ tad-arpaṇa-sthāne'rpayatu iti ṣaḍ-aṅgāni
GR14muktacau:778: śrī-gāndharvā devatā sa-bindu-prathama-varṇo bījaṃ śaktir upāsyopāsakayor
GR14muktacau:785: iti dhyānaṃ ca suciraṃ kārayitvā kṛpayā mahyaṃ kāmine kāma-bīja-puṭitaṃ
GR14muktacau:795: unmādo jāḍyam ity etai rathanir navabhir uttamaiḥ ||4||
GR14muktacau:808: tvāṃ natvā yācate dhṛtvā tṛṇaṃ dantair ayaṃ janaḥ |
GR14muktacau:810: na muñcec charaṇāyātam api duṣṭaṃ dayāmayaḥ |
GR14muktacau:811: ato gāndharvike hā hā muñcainaṃ naiva tādṛśam ||12||
GR14muktacau:815: tataḥ śrī-guror labdhābhīṣṭa-kāmo'smi iti sagadgadaṃ vadantaṃ sakampaṃ
GR14muktacau:816: tac-caraṇa-kamalayoḥ patitaṃ māṃ sānandaṃ samutthāpya samāliṅgya
GR14muktacau:818: man-mukhe vitaratu | brahmacāriṇo mama tāmbūla-bhakṣaṇam anucitam iti cet
GR14muktacau:820: kṛtārthena mayaitad-abhīpsitāni anyāny api bahūni ca muktāphalāni dakṣinātvena
GR14muktacau:822: iti niśamya sarvāsu sa-smitaṃ tuṅgavidyā-mukham avalokayantīṣu tayāpy
GR14muktacau:823: ucchalitāntarānandam āvṛtya bhrū-bhaṅgena saroṣam iva mām īṣad avalokya
GR14muktacau:824: bhāṣitaṃ | nāndīmukhi tvaṃ siddhā tapasviny asi | tasmād etad-vidhinā tvam
GR14muktacau:825: evainaṃ dīkṣaya | tadāsya siddhāto mantra-grahaṇāt svābhīṣṭa-kāma-lābho jhaṭiti
GR14muktacau:826: sampatsyata iti vyāhṛtya sakrodhaṃ gṛhāya gacchantīṃ kareṇa gṛhītvā vyāghoṭya
GR14muktacau:827: viśākhā vihasya nāndīmukhīṃ prāha -- nāndīmukhi! asya samprati
GR14muktacau:828: prāpta-vyalīkasya dīkṣā-dāne mahān eva pratyavāyaḥ syād ity ācāryeyaṃ tvāṃ
GR14muktacau:832: viśākhā -- tubhyaṃ śape satyam evaitad doṣam |
GR14muktacau:837: nāndīmukhī vihasya -- kā tāvat sā dāsī ?
GR14muktacau:838: viśākhā -- śākhoṭa-vana-vāsinī kācin māyayā gopīva bhūtvā
GR14muktacau:839: kaṃsa-bhṛtya-govardhana-malla-gṛhiṇīm āsādya tām uvāca candrāvali! tvaṃ
GR14muktacau:840: bhuvaneśvaryāś caṇḍikāyāḥ priya-paricārikāsi | aham api tad-gaṇa-madhye
GR14muktacau:841: ekāsmi | tataḥ sneha-bhareṇa tva-sakhītvam icchāmi | tac chrutvā samīcīnam etad
GR14muktacau:842: ity āliṅgya sā candrāvalī yāṃ sakhyena parijagrāha saiva |
GR14muktacau:844: viśākhā -- apūrvā padmā sā sarvatra prasiddhā bhavatyāpi jñāyate |
GR14muktacau:847: etan niśamya kiñcit smayamānāṃ rādhikām avalokayantas tat-sabhāsadaḥ sarve janā
GR14muktacau:848: jahasuḥ | tato nāndīmukhī -- viśākhe! kenāpy etad dṛṣṭam asti ?
GR14muktacau:853: evaitat parama-pāvanaṃ karma paraśva eva sākṣād avalokyāgatya sarvāsāṃ purato
GR14muktacau:858: nāndīmukhī -- tato bhagavatītas tad-doṣa-vihita-niṣkṛtiṃ sampādya puruṣottamam
GR14muktacau:860: tac chrutvā campakalatā prāha -- mugdhe! ujjvala-maṇi-saṃhitāyām eva vivṛto'sti
GR14muktacau:861: tan-niṣkṛti-vidhir bhavatyāḥ prāyeṇa gocaro na bhavatīti tayaiva kathā-prasaṅge
GR14muktacau:863: nāndīmukhī -- atra tat-saṃhitāṃ kas tāvaj jānāti ?
GR14muktacau:865: nāndīmukhī -- adhunā sā kilātra sabhā-madhye na vidyate | tat katham idaṃ
GR14muktacau:868: abhyasyantī suṣṭhu taj jānantī tan nirūpayiṣyati |
GR14muktacau:869: nāndīmukhī sa-kāku -- sakhi lalite! vicārya yathocita-niṣkṛtir ādiśyatām |
GR14muktacau:870: lalitā kiñcid vihasya -- priya-sakhi! kṛta-vaylīko jano yadi sabhā-madhye svayam
GR14muktacau:871: āgatya niḥśeṣaṃ svayam aghaṃ niṣkāpaṭyena nivedyānutapati, tadaivāsya
GR14muktacau:872: prāyaścittaṃ kāryate iti purāna-kṛdbhiḥ nirṇitam asti | tathā hi --
GR14muktacau:873: saṃkathya svam aghaṃ goṣṭhyāṃ paścāt tapati yaḥ sphuṭam |
GR14muktacau:874: tasyaiva niṣkṛtiḥ sāṅgā munibhiḥ kāryate'khilā || iti |
GR14muktacau:875: ity ākarṇya nāndīmukhyāṃ man-mukhaṃ sākūtam ālokayantyāṃ mayi ca
GR14muktacau:876: subala-madhumaṅgalābhyāṃ saha lalitā-savidham āsādya kiñcid vivakṣamāṇe sati,
GR14muktacau:877: viśākhā prāha -- he dhīra! kāmāturāṇāṃ na ghṛṇā na lajjeti svabhāvataḥ kāminā
GR14muktacau:878: tvayā yat kṛtaṃ tat kṛtam eva | adhunā tv etat tasyāḥ puro vivicya tat sarvaṃ
GR14muktacau:880: tato'haṃ smitam apavārya sānutāpam iva -- lalite! caturthe'hani
GR14muktacau:881: vighaṭita-gavānveṣaṇe gaurī-tīrtham evāptasya mama gaurī-mandirān niḥsṛtya
GR14muktacau:882: kācid gaurī sahacarī carcikā haṭhena mad-urasi savya-kucenāhatya
GR14muktacau:883: mādhavī-catuḥśālikāntarālaṃ mām ānīya kampamānasya mama mukhe
GR14muktacau:884: tāmbūla-carvitaṃ pradāya yat kiñcit kṛtavatī tan-mohito'haṃ kim api nāvediṣam |
GR14muktacau:888: āvirbhūya balenaiva mama vāma-gaṇḍaṃ paricumbya mukhe svādhara-pīyūṣam
GR14muktacau:891: madhumaṅgalo vihasyāha -- vayasya! bhadrataram idaṃ niṣkṛtaṃ yat tad aghasyaiva
GR14muktacau:893: tato'ham -- dhiṅ mūrkha! kim api na jānāsi | viṣasya viṣamauṣadham iti | yathā --
GR14muktacau:897: ity ādivad ucchiṣṭa-bhojana-doṣam ucchiṣṭa-bhojanam eva darayati |
GR14muktacau:898: madhumaṅgalaḥ -- evaṃvidha-pāpa-vyādhi-cikitsāyāṃ tvam eva sad-vaidyo'si tat kiṃ
GR14muktacau:901: jñāta-sāro'pi khalv ekaḥ sandigdhaḥ syāt sakarmaṇi |
GR14muktacau:903: iti niśamya lalitā smayamānā prāha -- he deva! devyā saha devasyaiva saṅgaḥ
GR14muktacau:904: sampatsyate tat katham asmākaṃ mānuṣīṇāṃ sā gocarībhavatu ?
GR14muktacau:905: tato mayoktaṃ -- lalite! sā kutrāpi mānuṣi bhavatīnām adūra eva virājamānā
GR14muktacau:907: tataḥ sarvāsu sakautukaṃ sa-śaṅkaṃ karṇākarṇi keyam iti vicārayantīṣu rādhā
GR14muktacau:908: svagataṃ -- etasya dhūrtasya narma-nyāsa etad-goṣṭhyām eva bhaviṣyatīti lakṣyate |
GR14muktacau:909: viśākhā -- deva! kathyatām kutra sā yathaināṃ saṃstutya sabhā-madhye samānīya
GR14muktacau:911: tato'haṃ -- viśākhe! bhavad-goṣṭhyām eva taḍid iva virājayantī sā | kiṃ
GR14muktacau:913: iti mad-gambhīrālāpam ākarṇya lalitāyām anyāsu sarvāsu ca ātmany ātmani tāṃ
GR14muktacau:914: narma-bhaṅgīm āśaṅkya parasparam ālokayantīṣu viśākhayoktaṃ -- lampaṭa! kiṃ
GR14muktacau:923: viśākhā -- iyam api na eṣāpi na asāv api na | tat kiṃ ito'ntarhitā |
GR14muktacau:924: tato'haṃ -- dhūrte! tvam eva tāṃ jānāsi | smṛtvā paśya |
GR14muktacau:925: lalitā -- hā hā sakhi viśākhe! tāṃ prakāśya vikalasyāsya kārya-siddhiṃ drutam
GR14muktacau:927: viśākhā smṛtim abhinīya -- lalite! yā mayā jñāyate sā devī-manuṣyayor ekatarāpi
GR14muktacau:929: nāndīmukhī -- goṣṭha-madhye devīṃ mānuṣīṃ vā vinā kā punar itarā ?
GR14muktacau:932: viśākhā smitvāha -- sā durmukhī padmā yayāsya vyalīkaṃ kṛtam asti |
GR14muktacau:933: tuṅgavidyā -- sakhi viśākhe! sā śaṅkhinīti saṃkathya kathaṃ kaluṣam utpādayasi
GR14muktacau:934: ? eṣā khalu bahutithaṃ kātyāyanī-devyā bahutara-sevā-prasādataḥ sākṣāt
GR14muktacau:936: tac chrutvā madhumaṅgalādiṣu hasatsu mayoktaṃ -- viśākhe! tal-lajjayā yadi tvam
GR14muktacau:939: tato mayoktaṃ -- sā carcikā-devī tvam eva |
GR14muktacau:940: tataḥ sā sarvāḥ smayamānā vilokya sakampādharam āha -- aye cañcala vañcaka!
GR14muktacau:947: dhārṣṭya-jambula-guḍa-haṭṭaṃ tatraiva śākhoṭa-vane gatvā prasāraya | ito drutam
GR14muktacau:949: iti śrutvā rādhā anuccaiḥ sa-ślāgham āha -- priya-sakhi viśākhe! vijayinī bhava
GR14muktacau:951: raṅgadevī -- sakhi viśākhe! tvaṃ kathaṃ kupasīty uktvā sakhi lalite! śākhoṭavanīṃ
GR14muktacau:956: arthottha-vyaṅgenaiva tvayi niveditam | tad upadiśāsya prāyaścittam ||
GR14muktacau:957: iti śrutvā lalitā vihasya -- ārya madhumaṅgala! sakhe subala! sannidhāya śrūyatām
GR14muktacau:963: lalitā -- mugdhe! tato'pi rāja-putrāṇāṃ niṣkṛtiḥ syād dviṣaḍ-guṇā iti pāṭhaḥ
GR14muktacau:964: saṃhitā-saṃmato mayā jñāyate | ṣaḍguṇeti kathaṃ bhaṇyate ?
GR14muktacau:965: citrā -- etac-chāstra-vijñayā tvayā yaj jñāyate tad eva satyam |
GR14muktacau:967: katidhānena yuvarājena vayaṃ na rakṣitāḥ sma ? tasmād
GR14muktacau:970: lalitā -- bhadraṃ tva-kathitam evedam anuṣṭhīyate | ādau pāpa-mocane snātvā
GR14muktacau:971: tathā mānasa-gaṅgāyāṃ tri-dināni snātaḥ sann eka-viṃśati-dināni
GR14muktacau:974: iti śravaṇena kapaṭa-kopa-vikaṭo madhumaṅgalaḥ prāha -- lalitike!
GR14muktacau:977: ceṭikā-pulindī-juṣṭa-bhakṣaṇena jāti-dhvaṃsaḥ kartum ārabdho bhavatībhis tad
GR14muktacau:978: aham atidrutaṃ gatvā vṛttam etat sa-viśeṣam āśrāvya etat-pitarāv atrānīya etat
GR14muktacau:979: saṅkaṭād amuṃ mocayan sauhṛdaṃ vitanomi | iti nigadya phutkṛtya drutaṃ
GR14muktacau:980: gacchantaṃ madhumaṅgalaṃ subalaḥ kare gṛhītvā balād iva nivartayāmāsa |
GR14muktacau:981: lalitā -- anārya baṭo! asmat-priya-sakhī-praṇayi-sakhyor anayor māhātmya-vijñāne
GR14muktacau:982: tvam anabhijño'si | tad bhavan nāndīmukhī-mukhād etac chrūyatām ||
GR14muktacau:985: yathā rādhā priyā viṣṇos tasyāḥ kuṇḍaṃ priyaṃ tathā ||
GR14muktacau:987: vaikuṇṭhāj janito varā madhupurī tatrāpi rāsotsavāt
GR14muktacau:990: kuryād asya virājato giri-taṭe sevāṃ vivekī na kaḥ ||
GR14muktacau:994: dakṣiṇa-taṭe giri-darī-vāsinyāḥ pūrṇāḥ pulindya urugāyety ādi
GR14muktacau:996: adhara-galita-parama-pāvana-pañcāmṛtam etad-durita-nāśakaṃ kiṃ na syāt ? anyac
GR14muktacau:997: ca śrūyatām | vraja-navīna-yuva-dvandva-ratnaṃ prati viśākhādi-dvārā kvacit
GR14muktacau:1002: etad-avasaraa eva netra-kuṇanena goṣṭhī-madhyāt tulasīm āhūya
GR14muktacau:1006: ekaḥ | śrī-gāndharvayā tat-kareṇa lalitādiṣu sañcāritaḥ | tatas taṃ lalitā śirasi
GR14muktacau:1007: nidhāya sakhībhiḥ saha rahaḥ paripaṭhya nāndīmukhī-kare sa-smitam arpitavatī |
GR14muktacau:1008: nāndīmukhī smitvānandam abhinīya vakṣasi nidhāya vācayati --
GR14muktacau:1027: ity ujjvala-saṃhitā-vacanam ananusmṛtyaiva lalitayā yat pañcāmṛta-pāna-rūpaṃ
GR14muktacau:1028: prāyaścittaṃ kevala-mukha-śodhanāya ca tantreṇa vidhāyāsmin nirdoṣe vihite
GR14muktacau:1029: mama mahaty eva nirvṛtir jāyate ity alam ativistareṇa ||
GR14muktacau:1032: rāja-putro'yaṃ parama-pavitro mahā-vilāsī ca | tan nija-caraṇa-kmala-ghātena
GR14muktacau:1035: premṇā śanaiḥ śanais tathā pāyayitavyaṃ yathāsya sukumārasya duritaṃ drutam
GR14muktacau:1037: iti niśamya sāntarānandaṃ rādhā-nikuñjam avalokayati mayi smitvā lalitā prāha
GR14muktacau:1041: iti viśeṣa-vacanena sāmānya-viśeṣayor viśeṣa-vidhir balavān iti nyāyenāsya
GR14muktacau:1042: dviṣaḍ-guṇam eva prāyaścittaṃ yuktam eva pṛthak pṛthak nirūpitam asti tathāpy
GR14muktacau:1043: ājñā gurūṇāṃ hy avicāraṇīyeti tad-ājñāṃ śirasi nidhāya tantreṇaiva kārayitavyam
GR14muktacau:1045: tataḥ śiṣye vidyā garīyasīti mayokte lalitā sākūtam āha -- nāndīmukhi!
GR14muktacau:1053: ca ta-sahacarīṃ cañcalo'yam avidagdha-bhramaraḥ punaḥ punar uḍḍīyoḍḍiyānusarati
GR14muktacau:1055: madhurā ratir aprasannā satī etac chyāmala-rasaṃ na puṣṇāti | tasmāt tathainam
GR14muktacau:1056: anabhijñaṃ yukta-mādhurībhiḥ prabodhaya | yathā tām avidagdhāṃ
GR14muktacau:1058: sarvato-bhāvenānusarati | tarhi tat-priya-sakhī madhurā ratiḥ svayam eva
GR14muktacau:1059: paramojjvalā bhavantī etad abhīṣṭa-kāmān sampādayiṣyaty eva |
GR14muktacau:1060: ity akhila-vilāsa-rasa-mādhurīm āpīya satyabhāmā vyājahāra -- prāṇanātha! etad
GR14muktacau:1061: apūrva-rasa-sāgare nimajjantyā mama manāg api tṛpteḥ paryāptir na vidyate |
GR14muktacau:1062: kṛṣṇaḥ -- priye! etad gokula-vilāsānanda-niṣkuṭe viharamāṇasya mama tvat-praśna
GR14muktacau:1065: kṛṣṇaḥ -- tataḥ subalaḥ sasmitam āha -- priyavayasya! priya-sakhīyam indulekhā
GR14muktacau:1066: durdurūḍhāt sva-bhartur bhāsvarākhyād udvignā mām iṅgitena prerayati | tad
GR14muktacau:1067: asyāḥ mauktik-mūlyaṃ nirṇīya tad dattvā jhaṭiti gṛha-kṛtyāya gantum
GR14muktacau:1069: tato'haṃ -- sakhe satyaṃ satyaṃ mayy atīvānurakteyaṃ mām api tyaktuṃ na śaknoti |
GR14muktacau:1070: tato'pi suṣṭhu bibhetīty aham api jānāmi | tad etan mauktika-mūlyaṃ śṛṇu --
GR14muktacau:1073: saṃrakṣatu | aham apy asahyaitad-virahas tāvad asyāḥ vakṣoja-parvatopari
GR14muktacau:1075: labdha-mahā-ratnam iva sarvato māṃ celāñcalenāvṛṇotu | rahasi ca kṣaṇe kṣaṇe
GR14muktacau:1078: tataḥ sakampādharaṃ kuṭilaṃ mām avalokayantīm indulekhām ālokya smayamānā
GR14muktacau:1079: tuṅgavidyā prāha -- nāgara! raṅgadevīyaṃ yathārtha-nāmnī tad asyā
GR14muktacau:1081: tato'ham -- sakhi raṅgadevi! rāsa-madhye tava lāsya-vilāsollāsaḥ santatam
GR14muktacau:1082: ālokito'sti | tad adhunā nikuñja-mandirāṅgane rahasi tad-viśeṣam anubhavitum
GR14muktacau:1083: abhilaṣāmi | tad ehi sva-vakṣoja-kanaka-kumbhau mad-urasi tathā nartaya
GR14muktacau:1087: tac chrutvā apaihi bhaṇḍa-śekhara! apaihīty uktvā kuṭilaṃ mām avalokya
GR14muktacau:1088: viśākhā-pṛṣṭhāntaritāyāṃ raṅgadevyāṃ sudevī sa-smitam āha -- rasika-śekhara!
GR14muktacau:1090: siddhim āsādayantī sphuṭam asmān api siddhārthāḥ kṛtavaty eva |
GR14muktacau:1093: tato'ham -- sakhe subala! sudevīyam akṣa-keli-dakṣeti prasiddhā tac chapatham eva
GR14muktacau:1094: dadad asmi kenāpi kasyāpi pakṣo na grāhyaḥ | āvām eva sva-buddhi-balena
GR14muktacau:1095: kheliṣyāvaḥ | tatra yady aham anayā suṣṭhu jīyeyaṃ, tarhi vāmena vakṣojena
GR14muktacau:1096: mad-vakṣṣasi mām āpīḍya mama sarvasva-bhūtam adharaṃ dviḥ pibatu | yadi vā
GR14muktacau:1097: mayedaṃ jīyate, tadā sva-dakṣiṇa-kaṭhina-vakṣojaṃ mad-dakṣiṇa-kareṇa nikāmaṃ
GR14muktacau:1099: tataḥ sā bhrū-bhaṅgena mām avalokayantī sāsūyaṃ viśākhām āha -- ayi viśākhe!
GR14muktacau:1100: sarva-kālam eva narma-svarṇa-vikrayy asau mahājanaḥ | sāmpratam eva
GR14muktacau:1101: muktā-maṇi-vyāpāram ārabhya tato vṛddhim alabhamānaḥ punaḥ sva-vṛttim
GR14muktacau:1103: kāñcana-mudrā-tatim itaḥ prakāma-mūlyena pragṛhya tayaiva muktāphalāny asmād
GR14muktacau:1104: ānayantu bhavatyaḥ | mayā tu gṛhāya gamyate |
GR14muktacau:1105: iti calitum udyatāñcale gṛhītvānaṅga-mañjaryā nivartitā sa-krodham iva sākūtaṃ
GR14muktacau:1106: punar āha -- keli-lampaṭa! nikāmam akṣa-keli-nipuṇeyam anaṅga-mañjarī tvayā
GR14muktacau:1108: tatas tad-vacana-mādhuryam avadhārya mayoktaṃ -- asyās tv abalāyās tat-keliṣu kā
GR14muktacau:1110: prāṇa-sahodareyaṃ mayy atīva snihyati | mama ca mānasa-madhukaraḥ param
GR14muktacau:1111: asyām anavaratam anuvrajyati | ataḥ samucita-paṇam antarāpi sutārāṇi suvṛttāni
GR14muktacau:1112: bahūni mauktikāny apy asyai vitariṣyāmi | paraṃ ca nirjana-nikuñja-vedikāyāṃ
GR14muktacau:1113: smara-puñjarākṣarāṇy asyāḥ pañcāśad aṅga-pratyaṅgeṣu sva-hastena vinyasya
GR14muktacau:1114: svāṅgaṃ svāṅgenālinṅgya mantreṇaināṃ vyāpayya tathā siddha-mantram ekam
GR14muktacau:1115: upadiśāmi yathā tad-grahaṇa-mātrād anaṅgaṃ sāṅgaṃ viracayya santuṣṭena tena
GR14muktacau:1117: sa-vinayam upaḍhaukayati | tataḥ suprasannena mayā tādṛg-āśīḥ-śatam ādhāsyate
GR14muktacau:1118: yena viṣama-śara-vilāsācāryeti padavīm āsādya dvi-guṇaṃ mām eva bhaktyā
GR14muktacau:1120: iti mad-bhāṣita-kusuma-stavakaṃ śravaṇāvataṃsīkṛtya sakampādharaṃ mām īṣad
GR14muktacau:1121: avalokayantī smita-subhaga-vadanābhir ābhiḥ snehenotphullatayā tad-agrajayā ca
GR14muktacau:1122: sa-smitaṃ sa-snehaṃ ca nirīkṣyamāṇā tulasī-raṅgaṇamālikayor upapṛṣṭham
GR14muktacau:1125: kṛṣṇaḥ -- tadānīm eva mallī-bhṛṅgībhyām ānīya dattaṃ lekha-dvayam | sarvābhiḥ
GR14muktacau:1126: samam eva vācayitvā paramotphullā lalitā tayor ekaṃ lekhaṃ subala-haste
GR14muktacau:1130: tataḥ subale lekham udghāṭya laghu laghu vācayati sati nāndīmukhī -- subala!
GR14muktacau:1133: ahaṃ -- sakhe! vācaya mamāpi mahatī śuśrūṣā vartate |
GR14muktacau:1141: anavarata-virājamānam api vraja-maṇḍale śaśvan nitarāṃ virājatām || kāṛyam idam
GR14muktacau:1142: anyad api avadhehi priya-jana-sakāśāt kara-grahaṇam anucitam iti bahutaram api
GR14muktacau:1143: kara-dravyam apahāyaiva etāvad-dinaṃ kim api noktam āsīt | samprati
GR14muktacau:1145: api nirvṛti-lavam alabhamānayā yat kiñcin mayā vijñāpyamānam asti | tad-aguṇam
GR14muktacau:1148: lalitayā saha lekha-pratilekham ācārya samucita-kara-dravym iha tvaritam eva
GR14muktacau:1149: prahitya dīyatāṃ, yathā dravyeṇaiva mathurāto mauktikāny ānāyya gurubhyaḥ
GR14muktacau:1152: yadi bhavādṛśām aśaktiḥ syāt tarhi pañcabhir militvā samucita-mūlyaṃ nirṇīya
GR14muktacau:1153: etad-dravya-parivartanena mauktikani lalitā-haste deyānīti kiṃ bahunā
GR14muktacau:1155: etan niśamya paramānanda-pūrṇenāpi mayā sākūtam uktaṃ -- ayi malli! ayi
GR14muktacau:1158: tatas tan-nikuñja-diśaṃ tiryag-avalokayann ahaṃ -- kutra vartate sā ?
GR14muktacau:1163: tato'haṃ -- sakhe subala! ,amue liṭiolayā lalitayaiva kasyacid dvārā lekhayitvā
GR14muktacau:1165: subalaḥ -- nahi nahi | rādhāyā eva sva-hasta-likhita-varṇānāṃ vinyāso'yam |
GR14muktacau:1166: tato'ham -- sakhe! tat tāvad idaṃ darśayati tad-dhastād ākṛṣya lekham ālokya
GR14muktacau:1167: sa-camatkāram ātmagataṃ -- aho akṣarāṇāṃ paṅkti-vistṛtir iyaṃ man-netrayoḥ
GR14muktacau:1169: kṛtān iti bhaṅgyā vikhyāpya prakāśaṃ vihasya āścaryam āścaryam
GR14muktacau:1170: ākāśa-kusumam iva dhūrtābhir etābhiḥ kim apy anyad akasmād eva
GR14muktacau:1174: tad advitīyāṃ durlalitāṃ lalitāṃ vāg-vilāsābhāsa-mātreṇaiova parājity a avatiṣṭha
GR14muktacau:1175: te dhriyate yāvad eko'pi ripus tāvat kutaḥ sukham ity ādi saṃsmṛtya sarvāsām
GR14muktacau:1176: asmad-vṛndāvana-rājya-kāṅkṣiṇīnāṃ dhūrtānāṃ tatim imām ito vṛndāvanāt
GR14muktacau:1177: jhaṭiti vidrāvaya | tato niṣkaṇṭaka-rājye madhurāṇi rasavanti phalāny upabhujya
GR14muktacau:1179: tato mayoktaṃ -- lalite! iyam asmad-vṛndāṭavī | bhavat-sakhyā rājyaṃ kuto jātam |
GR14muktacau:1182: tato'ham -- lalite! samakṣa-darśanaṃ tāvad-dūre 'stu tac-chravaṇam api jātam astīti
GR14muktacau:1186: cetas tat-saṃsargī ca tādṛśa iti etad-vayasyayor anayor api | tat katham ete smarantu
GR14muktacau:1187: nāma ? tasmāt tat kathana-pīyūṣa-prasyandena karṇa-vivareṣu praveśiten bāḍham
GR14muktacau:1188: amīṣāṃ cetāṃsi kāruṇyenāvirbhāvaya yathaiṣāṃ smṛtiḥ sampadyate |
GR14muktacau:1189: tatas tadānīm evāgatāṃ sarvābhir evānanditāṃ vṛndām āliṅgya lalitā sa-smitam
GR14muktacau:1190: āha -- vṛnde! bhadrāvasare tvaṃ prāptāsi | tat tvayaiva nirvarṇyatāṃ
GR14muktacau:1195: lalitā sānandam -- bhadraṃ sarvair avadhāya śrūyatām | ṛtu-pativasanta-samaye
GR14muktacau:1215: lalitā tato mayaiva sucīna-vasanena śanaiḥ śanair aṅgāny āmṛjya surakta-dukūlaṃ
GR14muktacau:1222: lyādibhir yathā-sthānaṃ yathā-śobhaṃ nikāmam alaṅkṛtety ardhokte
GR14muktacau:1224: āsādayantī sā lalitā viśākhayā sasambhramaṃ pṛṣṭhe samālambya karṇe rādhe
GR14muktacau:1225: kṛṣṇa rādhe kṛṣṇeti kīrtanāmṛtena sandhukṣitā kṣaṇaṃ maunena dhairyam
GR14muktacau:1227: tadānīm eva mūrcchitāṃ lalitām ālakṣya -- hā
GR14muktacau:1229: nirāśā kṛtāsmi | hā bhagavan! bhakta-vatsala! bhāskara-deva! rakṣa rakṣa | hā
GR14muktacau:1234: jīvitām ācārya kilaitat-paṇenaiva saṃkrīya dāsī krityatām iyaṃ tapasvinī rādhiketi
GR14muktacau:1235: vilapya sāśru-dhāraṃ vegena tām āliṅgitum āgacchantī rādhikā
GR14muktacau:1237: ity avakalanāt trāsena sāntaḥkampaṃ raṅgaṇavallī-tulasībhyāṃ tat-savidham
GR14muktacau:1238: upalabdhaṃ tato raṅnaṇavallyā vāma-bhujayā tat-pṛṣṭham avaṣṭabhya
GR14muktacau:1239: dakṣiṇa-kareṇa mṛdu mṛdu mṛjyamānā hā nātha rakṣa rakṣa iti sāśru-pravāhaṃ
GR14muktacau:1241: bījyamānā bāhyam upālabhya susthām iva lalitām ālokayantī sānandā babhūva |
GR14muktacau:1251: mayoktaṃ -- lalite! etat kathaṃ mayā na jñāyate etena kiṃ vo rājyam āyātam ?
GR14muktacau:1252: pratyuta etad uṭṭaṅkanāt sva-mukhenaiva bhavatībhir yuṣmat-sahitam idaṃ rājyaṃ
GR14muktacau:1255: tato'ham -- yato vṛndāvana-purandarasya mamaiva rājñītvena mad-iṅgitenaiva
GR14muktacau:1257: viśākhā vihasya -- asaṅgata-bhāṣin! purandarasya mahiṣi devy eva bhavati | sā
GR14muktacau:1258: khalu śacīti prasiddhā svarge vasati | iyaṃ tu mama sakhī bhūmi-vihāriṇī
GR14muktacau:1260: mayoktaṃ -- tarkācārya-śiromaṇiṃ-manye viśākhe! tvaṃ suṣṭhu jaḍāsi yad bāraṃ
GR14muktacau:1261: bāram adhītam api pratyakṣa-khaṇḍaṃ tvayā vismṛtam eva |
GR14muktacau:1263: mayoktaṃ -- śrūyatām | yadi bhavat-sahacarī mat-preyasī na syāt tarhi
GR14muktacau:1264: mad-vakṣaḥ-sthāsakāhṛta-mṛgamadena kathaṃ bhagavatī tāṃ tilakinīṃ cakāra ?
GR14muktacau:1272: kila bhagavatyā vibhūṣitā | tava kas tatra sambandhaḥ ?
GR14muktacau:1273: tuṅgavidyā -- sakhi lalite! sādhu sambodhitaṃ yad ayam alīka-purandara eva |
GR14muktacau:1275: tuṅgavidyā -- śrūyatāṃ asmin māthura-pradeśe yācaka-dvija-kalāvadādibhir eva
GR14muktacau:1297: ikasyāsya, tad avadhi yaśaḥ-pratāpa-prakāśa-laharī brahmāṇḍa-bhare yādṛśī
GR14muktacau:1298: prasarantī vartate | tām anubhavantībhir bhavatībhir api sākṣān mahendratvaṃ yan
GR14muktacau:1299: na manyate, tad bhavatīnām anayo'yaṃ mahān eveti mayi prabhāsate |
GR14muktacau:1300: iti niśamya sa-smitaṃ nayana-kūṇanena sa-smita-lajjita-man-mukham ālokya
GR14muktacau:1301: parasparaṃ cālokayantīṣu tāsu citrā vihasya - bhoḥ katham asau pariahasyate
GR14muktacau:1303: tuṅgavidyā - citre! iti cet sa katham atrāgataḥ ?
GR14muktacau:1304: citrā - śrūyatām | para-ramaṇīto'yam iti sarvataḥ samadhigamya krodhinyā devā
GR14muktacau:1305: padāghātena nirbhartstas tāṃ parama-sukhada-tan-nija-bhavanaṃ ca nirvedataḥ
GR14muktacau:1306: parityajya vanam idam āgatya parama-mañjula-navīna-gopatvam ivāsādya
GR14muktacau:1307: puraścaraṇa-vidhānenaiva vṛndāvaneśvaryāḥ karṣako bhūtvā sukhena samayaṃ
GR14muktacau:1308: gamayann asti | tad enaṃ hāsya-rasa-viṣayālambanam avidhāya
GR14muktacau:1309: bāṭika-rūpa-prāghuṇe' smin sneha eva nikāmaṃ vidhīyatām |
GR14muktacau:1310: tac chrutvā sarvāsu smera-mukhīṣu nāndīmukhī vihasya - sakhi citre! vraja eva
GR14muktacau:1311: nitya-vihāriṇi vrajendra-nandane yat kiñcit tvayedaṃ vyāhṛtam | tasya
GR14muktacau:1312: śabdārthottha-gūḍhābhiprāyeṇa bhavitavyam iti lakṣyate | tatas tasya
GR14muktacau:1314: tataḥ smitvā muni-vratam ālambitavatyāṃ citrāyāṃ vṛndā sānandam āha -
GR14muktacau:1315: nāndīmukhi! asyāḥ parama-vidagdhāyā gūḍhābhiprāyaḥ sphuṭaṃ mayaiva
GR14muktacau:1317: nāndīmukhīn - katham asya devendratvam ? tat prakaṭaya |
GR14muktacau:1319: tathā dīvyanti viśeṣeṇa dyotante iti devāḥ |
GR14muktacau:1321: teṣām apīndro mahā-parivṛḍha iti devendras tebhyo'pi paramotkarṣeṇa suṣṭhu
GR14muktacau:1323: nāndīmukhī sa-smitaṃ - samīcīno'yam artho vivṛtaḥ kintu para-ramaṇī-rata ity
GR14muktacau:1325: vṛndā - parā anyā tathā parā vipakṣā, tathā parā paramotkṛṣṭā, parā cāsau
GR14muktacau:1326: ramaṇī ceti para-ramaṇī śrī-rādhikā tasyāṃ rataḥ paramāśaktas tām eva
GR14muktacau:1328: campakalatā smitvā - vṛnde! devy api nirūpyatām |
GR14muktacau:1329: vṛndā - nādevo devam arcayed iti caṇḍikā-paricaryāparatvāt asya devasya bhāryeti
GR14muktacau:1330: vā | kiṃ vā amaṅgale maṅgala-śabdavad iyaṃ devī |
GR14muktacau:1333: vṛndā smitvā maunam ālambate | sarvāḥ smitaṃ kurvanti | nāndīmukhī
GR14muktacau:1334: padāghāteneti dhārṣṭyātiśayena tasyā anuttamatā sphuṭaiva kintu
GR14muktacau:1337: vā parama-sukhaṃ dārayatīti parama-sukhadaṃ yat tasyā devyā nija-bhavanaṃ
GR14muktacau:1339: nāndīmukhī - aho! śabdānāṃ gūḍhārtha-vijñāyās tava vyākhyā-kauśalaṃ tad
GR14muktacau:1345: prathamato nitya-nūtanatā ca dhvanitā | puraścaraṇa-saṃvidhāneneti puraḥ
GR14muktacau:1355: bhūtvā tena tām unmādya nija-nikaṭam ākṛṣyety arthaḥ |
GR14muktacau:1365: sāmpratam āsāṃ gṛha-pālī vṛttāsti | tat kathaṃ na bukkiṣyate ?
GR14muktacau:1369: mallī-bhṛṅgyau - devi lalite! svāminyā yad anya-patreṇa likhitam asti | tat kiṃ
GR14muktacau:1372: mallī-bhṛṅgyau - samucita-kara-dāne yaḥ kuyuktim uttolya virodham ācarati so'tra
GR14muktacau:1374: lalitā - āṃ | tat-kara-dāna-virodhī madhumaṅgala eva | tad enaṃ latā-pāśena
GR14muktacau:1375: dṛḍhaṃ nibadhya komalāyāḥ priya-sakhyāḥ savidham ānītvaiva
GR14muktacau:1376: jaṭilābhimanyu-pārśve yuvābhyām eva satvaraṃ samarpyatām | yathā sa
GR14muktacau:1378: madhumaṅgalaḥ antaḥ-sa-bhayam iva - vayasya! kiñcin nigūḍhaṃ kāryaṃ mama gṛhe
GR14muktacau:1380: tato'haṃ - dhig brāhmaṇa! katham abalā-vāg-āḍambareṇa mad-agrato'pi bibheṣi ?
GR14muktacau:1381: madhumaṅgalaḥ - mahāśūra! ghaṭṭī-pālasya tava govardhane dāna-vartanyāṃ
GR14muktacau:1382: bahuśaḥ śauryaṃ anubhūtam asti | yat tasmin dine etābhir eva
GR14muktacau:1384: nīyamānam api māṃ vīkṣamāṇa eva vilakṣas tvam āsīḥ | aham eva
GR14muktacau:1386: ity uktvā bhītim anukṛtya palāyantam iva taṃ kare gṛhītvā parāvartya mayoktaṃ -
GR14muktacau:1387: lalite! tādṛśyāḥ komalābalāyā api katham ahaṃ karaṃ dāsyāmi ? pratyuta balāt
GR14muktacau:1389: iti niśamya netra-bhāgena mām īṣad avalokayantī rādhā susmitā āsīt |
GR14muktacau:1390: nāndīmukhī - citre! bāṭikā-prāghuṇa ity asya kas tāvad abhiprāyaḥ ?
GR14muktacau:1391: lalitā - nāndīmukhi! taj jānaty api kathaṃ pṛcchasi ? yat
GR14muktacau:1394: nāndīmukhī - priya-janma-bhūmes tyāgena kiṃ tāvat kāraṇam ?
GR14muktacau:1395: rādhā auccaiḥ - tat-sthānasyāsvācchandyāt janatādhikyena tad-grāme nagara iva
GR14muktacau:1401: ity evaṃ lalitayā sphuṭaṃ vyāhṛte sa-smitaṃ sākūtam āha - lalite! sāmpratam asya
GR14muktacau:1403: rādhā punar anuccaiḥ - satyam eva kathyate | yad ayaṃ samprati sva-dharma-tyāgena
GR14muktacau:1405: pūrvam api vihita-niṣkṛtena nirvāsya, nirveda-kṛta-vivekena tāsām eva kṛṣi-vṛttam
GR14muktacau:1406: eva nija-dharmam ācarya prakāmaṃ śasyāny utpādya tābhyaḥ pradāya tat svāṃśam
GR14muktacau:1407: api svayam ādāya tāḥ svātmānam apy ānandayan mahāśucir iva virājate | ity eva
GR14muktacau:1409: tatas tan niśamya sarveṣu hāsa-kolāhala-mahotsavam āviṣkurvatsu sa-kapaṭāsūyaṃ
GR14muktacau:1410: mayoktam - sakhe subala! dhūrtābhir imābhir narma-bhaṅgī-miṣeṇa mama
GR14muktacau:1412: subalaḥ - na kevalam adhikāritaiva dūrīkṛtā kintu karṣako'pi kṛto'si |
GR14muktacau:1413: vṛndā - subala! tvaṃ bahu-śruto vicakṣaṇas tathānayor api parama-snigdhaḥ | tat
GR14muktacau:1414: kathaṃ nāndīmukhyā sahānayorḥ parama-snigdhayor api rājya-hetor
GR14muktacau:1416: tato bhadraṃ bhadram iti mayā lalitayā cokte subalaḥ prāha - vayasya! prathamaṃ
GR14muktacau:1417: tāvat katham āsām etad rājyaṃ tal lalitaiva kathayatu | paścād bhavān api kathaṃ
GR14muktacau:1419: tato'haṃ - subala! yāsāṃ vraja-deva-kanyānām ajñānenāpi saṅgam ācarya
GR14muktacau:1420: jāta-vyalīko'haṃ prāyaścittena śuddho'bhavaṃ sa kathaṃ tābhiḥ samam api punar
GR14muktacau:1424: śyāmala-viṣama-śara-sarovara-mahā-tīrthe punaḥ punaḥ snapanena śuddīkṛtā eva
GR14muktacau:1425: sva-nikaṭam āpitāḥ santi tac cīrṇa-niṣkṛtayor ubhayoḥ saṃvāde doṣo nāsti | tal
GR14muktacau:1427: lalitā - prathamaṃ tāvad asmin vṛndāvana-rājye'syālīka-vādino dhūrtasyādhipatyaṃ
GR14muktacau:1433: subalaḥ - lalite! madhyasthena mayā yathārtham eva vaktavyam | tvan-mukham
GR14muktacau:1434: ālokya mithyā vaktuṃ na śakyate | tad asya bṛhad-vana-rājyatvenaiva bhavatyā
GR14muktacau:1435: vṛndāvana-rājyādhipatyaṃ kim āyāti ? kintu tatra cet mahā-pramāṇam asti, tad
GR14muktacau:1437: lalitā - pratyakṣaṃ parokṣam api bahutara-purāṇa-vacana-kulam asti | tatrāpi
GR14muktacau:1438: pratyakṣa-parokṣayoḥ pratyakṣam eva balīya ity anusāreṇa pratyakṣam eva
GR14muktacau:1441: lalitā - mayā kiṃ tad vaktavyam ? yuṣmākam anubhūtam eva tat |
GR14muktacau:1445: sa ca trilokī-vāsiṣu kasya vā paramānanda-pradāyako na saṃvṛtto'sti |
GR14muktacau:1446: tataḥ subalaḥ - lalite! etat tu tāvad anyathātvena nirūpya priya-vayasyo yuṣmān apy
GR14muktacau:1448: lalitā - subala! etac ced bhavad-dvipada-gopa-priya-vayasyaḥ satyam eva vakti tarhi
GR14muktacau:1449: vṛndāvana-rājye æbhiṣiktāyā mahā-siṃhāsana-sthāyā ity ādi tathaitasyāś
GR14muktacau:1450: caraṇānujīvino mamety ādi vyāhṛtya svāmy asau sāmpratam api kathaṃ tac
GR14muktacau:1452: āgraheṇādhyavasyann astīty ādi sarvaṃ kiṃ bhavādṛgbhir vismṛtam ?
GR14muktacau:1453: nāndīmukhī smitvā - lalite! asya vilāsino rāja-putrasya madana-modaka-bhojino
GR14muktacau:1454: mahā-kāmukasya yat pralapitaṃ tat kim atra pramāṇaṃ syāt ? anyac ced gāḍhaṃ
GR14muktacau:1456: vṛndā - yad yat pramāṇam iyaṃ darśayati, tat tad evāsyonmādino rāja-putrasya
GR14muktacau:1457: pakṣam āśritya yuvābhyāṃ khaṇḍyate | ato'nyat sarvatra prasiddham api pramāṇaṃ
GR14muktacau:1459: nāndīmukhī - vṛnde! tat tvayaiva tāvat kathyatām |
GR14muktacau:1480: alaṃ bilvaṃ tālaṃ karakam udayac cāru-kucayoḥ
GR14muktacau:1508: pare ye muktāḥ syuḥ sthira-cara-padārthā vraja-bhuvaḥ
GR14muktacau:1509: sadā stavyā bhavyais trijagati nikāmaṃ jana-kulaiḥ |
GR14muktacau:1511: rati-śrī-varṇyāyāḥ pariṣadi yathā yuktam api te ||12||
GR14muktacau:1519: nijām etāṃ rakṣāmy aṭavim iha gocāra-miṣataḥ
GR14muktacau:1520: kathaṃ svārūpyeṇaiva tu bhavatu vaḥ sāmpratam iyam ||14||
GR14muktacau:1522: sakhitvaṃ yo yasya vrajati nija-sārūpyam athavā
GR14muktacau:1523: na cet tasya syān no bhavati param anyasya hi tadā |
GR14muktacau:1524: kathaṃ no gṛhṇāsi druta-gatir idaṃ hanta kathayan
GR14muktacau:1525: svayaṃ gatvā lakṣmīṃ tad inasamarūpaṃ gaṇam api ||15||
GR14muktacau:1526: tan niśamya sāṭṭa-hāsaṃ madhumaṅgalaḥ - bho asatya-vādini vṛnde!
GR14muktacau:1530: nāndīmukhī - lalite! vijña-prācīna-munīśvara-vacanaṃ vinā ko'pi nirasto na
GR14muktacau:1532: lalitā - asya pakṣam āśritya tādṛgbhir evaṃ cet kathyate tadā tatra gatvā
GR14muktacau:1535: lalitā - vallava-jātīnāṃ tatrāpi strīṇām asmākaṃ purāṇa-vacana-pāṭhe'dhikāra eva
GR14muktacau:1537: subalaḥ - vṛndeyaṃ devī | tad iyam eva śrāvayatu |
GR14muktacau:1538: vṛndā smṛtim abhinīya - atra subahūni vacanāni santi | tāni kati pāṭhyāni kintu
GR14muktacau:1539: anyeṣu deśeṣu anyāḥ pṛthak pṛthag devīr adhikariṇīr uktvā rādhā vṛndāvane
GR14muktacau:1540: vane iti sarvopamardakaṃ purāṇa-vacanaṃ bhagavatyāḥ sakāśāt kena vā na śrutam
GR14muktacau:1542: tatas tāsāṃ jayābhimānena praphullatām ālokya madhumaṅgalaḥ sāṭopam āha -
GR14muktacau:1545: priya-vayasyaṃ brahma-bhavādayo'pi nirantaraṃ gāyantaḥ santīti ke vā na jānanti
GR14muktacau:1546: ? tataḥ śrutyā smṛtir bādhyate ity asmākam evedaṃ rājyaṃ susiddham | tat sakhe
GR14muktacau:1548: tataḥ sakhe tvam eva me priyaṅkaraḥ priya-vayasya iti sānandaṃ madhumaṅgalam
GR14muktacau:1549: āliṅgati mayi kiñcid vailakṣyam iva rādhādhiṣṭhita-nikuñjam ālokya
GR14muktacau:1550: lalitādi-mukham ālokayantyāṃ nāndīmukhyāṃ rādhā smitvā anuccaiḥ - aho
GR14muktacau:1555: tatas tasminn eva varṇa-vinyāse solluṇṭhaṃ lalitayāpi prakāśite sati
GR14muktacau:1556: kṛṣṇa-vana-śabdasyārthāntaraṃ nūnam eṣā ghaṭayiṣyatīti tad-abhiprāyaṃ manasi
GR14muktacau:1557: manāk vicārayati mayi nāndīmukhī sacamatkāraṃ māṃ prāha - jayākāṅkṣin!
GR14muktacau:1558: ekaṃ vijñāpayitum icchāmi yadi tubhyaṃ rocate |
GR14muktacau:1560: nāndīmukhī - śyāma-vana-samāsam ācarya tvayā saha tat-samāsenaiva nyāyam
GR14muktacau:1561: ācarya tvāṃ parājitya svarājyam ādātuṃ laliteyam abhilaṣati |
GR14muktacau:1563: jānāti yad anayā tad-vana-puṣpair muhuḥ śṛṅgārito'smi | tad vyākaraṇasya keyam
GR14muktacau:1565: vṛndā smitvā - vyākaraṇa-vijñaṃ-manya! tvatto'pi mat-priya-sakhī lalitā
GR14muktacau:1568: vṛndā - tvat-pakṣam āśritya vivadamānāṃ māṃ kim ity ākṣipasi ?
GR14muktacau:1569: lalitā - bhoḥ samāsācārya-śārdūla! kathaṃ svepsitāpara-samāsena vibhīṣikāṃ
GR14muktacau:1574: tat-puruṣa-samāsaṃ viracayya para-rājyaṃ grahītuṃ katham abhilaṣasi | yad atra
GR14muktacau:1576: tato mayoktaṃ - caturaṃmanye! prakaṭe'tra tat-puruṣa-samāse kathaṃ
GR14muktacau:1577: karamadhārayādi-yojanā sambhavati | bhavatu bhavatu durjana iti nyāyena tad eva
GR14muktacau:1579: rādhā anuccaiḥ - vanasyāsya ghanatā-prācaryeṇa kṛṣṇaṃ śyāmaṃ ca tad-vanaṃ ceti
GR14muktacau:1581: ity evaṃ lalitayāpi sphuṭaṃ bhāṣite campakalatā sa-ślāgham āha - lalite! sādhu
GR14muktacau:1584: dhārayati niṣpādayati prakāśayati vā ity asya vanasya karmadhārayatvaṃ sphuṭam
GR14muktacau:1586: punar lalitā rādhānucca-bhāṣitam evānuvadati - kṛṣṇāni kvacid kvacid atiśyāmāni
GR14muktacau:1587: vanāni yatra tat kṛṣṇa-vanam iti vṛndāvanasya viśeṣaṇatvena bahuvrīhir api |
GR14muktacau:1588: vṛndā -- satyaṃ satyaṃ kālindī-tīra-rāsa-sthalyām andhakāri-baṭa-vanaṃ, tathā
GR14muktacau:1591: indulekhā - lalite! satyaṃ satyaṃ bahavo brīhayo dhānyādi-śasyāni kiṃ vā
GR14muktacau:1592: kedārikā-jātatvān muktā eva brīhayaḥ | bahavo brīhayo yasmin nityasya vanasya
GR14muktacau:1597: lalitā - mahā-paṇḍita! tat-puruṣas tatpuruṣa iti bāraṃ bāraṃ jalpasi | tatpuruṣas
GR14muktacau:1598: tāvad aneka-vidho bhavati | tatra katamo'yaṃ sa iti suṣṭhu nirṇīya kathyatām |
GR14muktacau:1599: mayoktaṃ - jaḍa-buddhike! kṛṣṇasya vanaṃ kṛṣṇa-vanam iti ṣaṣṭhī-tatpuruṣas
GR14muktacau:1601: rādhā - kṛṣṇasya vanam iti cet tarhi sakhīsthalī-baṭa-śreṇir eva puruṣa-śārdūlasya
GR14muktacau:1602: tava vanam | yataḥ ṣaṣṭhī-tatpuruṣo'pi nityaṃ tatraiva vartate |
GR14muktacau:1603: atra ṣaṣṭhī-samāsasya sambhāvanāpi na vidyate ity evaṃ vihasya lalitayāpy ukte
GR14muktacau:1604: nāndīmukhī - lalite! eṣa te vāg-vinyāso garbhita-sandarbha iti lakṣyate tat
GR14muktacau:1606: tato lalitā netrānta-nīlotpala-mālayā mām akurvatī smita-garbhitam āha -
GR14muktacau:1607: nāndīmukhi! ṣaṣṭhī kācid ekā | tasyāḥ puruṣaḥ patir eva jano vā
GR14muktacau:1609: viśākhā sa-smitaṃ - lalite! tat-puruṣo jñāta eva | sā tāvat kā ?
GR14muktacau:1613: mahā-bhairavaḥ | dvitīyā tan-mātā bhāruṇḍā caṇḍī, tṛtīyā candrāvalī-mātā
GR14muktacau:1614: mahī-karālā carcikā | caturthī śaivyā kālī | pañcamī padmā śaṅkhinī prasiddhā |
GR14muktacau:1615: ṣaṣṭhī sakhīsthalī-baṭa-vāsinī candrāvalī ṣaṣṭhī | yato baṭa-vana-vāsitvāt
GR14muktacau:1617: tataḥ sarveṣāṃ hāsa-kolāhala-vṛtte ahaṃ svagataṃ - aho buddher variṣṭhatā
GR14muktacau:1618: vraja-bālānāṃ, yad aham api vacanāṭopa-vilāsair nirvacanīkṛto'smi | prakāśaṃ
GR14muktacau:1630: etāvantaṃ kālaṃ duḥkhadatvenāpi na gaṇitavān asmi |
GR14muktacau:1631: sāmprataṃ mama doṣo na deyaḥ | adhunaiva nija-nija-vakṣasi
GR14muktacau:1637: iti sāṭopaṃ sahasopasṛtya tāḥ sandidhīrṣau mayi
GR14muktacau:1639: tato manāg apasarpantīṣu sarvāsu, sa-roṣam iva lalitā - aye śyāmala
GR14muktacau:1640: rasa-pāna-nirata! apehi apehi | etāṃ te matta-tāra-bhaṭīṃ vrajeśvaryai varṇayituṃ
GR14muktacau:1642: satyabhāmā sa-camatkāraṃ hasantī - vinodin! ekaṃ praṣṭum icchāmi |
GR14muktacau:1644: satyabhāmā - rādhā-svagata-lapitāvalir eva lalitādibhir api katham anvavādi ?
GR14muktacau:1645: kṛṣṇaḥ - priye! rādhāyāḥ kāya-vyūha-rūpā eva lalitādayas tat kathaṃ
GR14muktacau:1647: satyabhāmā - subhaga! rādhāyā narmottara-varṇa-vinyāsaḥ kathaṃ vā
GR14muktacau:1651: gāndharvā-giridhāriṇau tat kathaṃ na sañcaratv iti |
GR14muktacau:1661: upalabhya yugapat tvaritam upary upari tam āliṅgituṃ sarvataḥ sarabhasam
GR14muktacau:1662: ārabhamāneṣu - re re vidagdha-śiromaṇiṃ-manyāḥ! khelana-samayam uttamaṃ
GR14muktacau:1670: sa-bhrū-bhaṅgaṃ nayana-ghūrṇana-līlayā vihita-pratiṣedhāt svayam api ca paścād
GR14muktacau:1671: avadhāya | bho bhoḥ! anāyyam anāyyam iti rasajñāṃ daśanaiḥ saṃdaśya laghu laghu
GR14muktacau:1672: sa-saṅkocaṃ sva-pṛṣṭena dūram apasaratsu teṣu - tato'sphuṭa-bahir-vikāra-nikaraḥ
GR14muktacau:1673: sambhṛta-hṛt-kampātiśayaḥ sa śrī-śrīmān yādavendraḥ svagatam idaṃ vilalāpa -
GR14muktacau:1676: rādhike! hā hā mad-duritena kena nidhivat prāptā karāt tvaṃ cyutā ?
GR14muktacau:1678: gokula-vilāsa-mādhurī-makarandaṃ dhayantyā api mama pipāsā param ullālasīti |
GR14muktacau:1682: alaṅghya-vākya-sacivo'smi | tad apūrvaṃ kam apy utkocaṃ mahyaṃ dehi | mayā
GR14muktacau:1684: viśākhā - ārya! kim apy atra nāsti | sāyaṃ sa-krośanārthaṃ tubhyaṃ
GR14muktacau:1685: varāṭikā-catuṣṭayam avaśyaṃ deyam | yadi pratītir na kriyate tvayā nāndīmukhī
GR14muktacau:1687: madhumaṅgalaḥ sa-krodhaṃ - avadya-bhāṣiṇi ābhīrike! tiṣṭha tiṣṭha | eṣo'haṃ
GR14muktacau:1688: sadya eva tavaitat prāyaścittaṃ kārayann asi iti nigadya māṃ pratyuvāca -
GR14muktacau:1690: saṃvardhita-garva-vaiśvānarābhir amūbhiḥ suṣṭhu bhavantam upālabhya mām api
GR14muktacau:1692: tato'haṃ - sakhe! satyaṃ satyaṃ yathā vinā rājadhānī-jayena tad-deśāḥ suṣṭhu vaśā
GR14muktacau:1693: na bhavanti | tathaitad yūtheśā parābhavam antareṇa tadīyāḥ katham amūr amūkā
GR14muktacau:1694: na bhavantu | iti nigadya rādhā-sanāthaṃ kuñjaṃ paśyan sa-nirvedaṃ punar avadaṃ -
GR14muktacau:1695: kiṃ kartavyaṃ sā kilaitad bhayenaiva mat-sānnidhyaṃ nāsāditavatī iti niśamya
GR14muktacau:1696: drutam udgrīvikāvalokanāt saṅkucantī rādhā kuñja-madhye niviṣṭaḥ babhūva |
GR14muktacau:1698: kṛṣṇaḥ - tato'haṃ - nāndīmukhi! lalitādīnāṃ tāruṇya-dhanād api tasyās
GR14muktacau:1701: mayoktaṃ - yata āsāṃ tāvat sampūṭa-dvaya-parimitaṃ tat tasyās tu
GR14muktacau:1705: nāndīmukhī - mohana! atisuguptam etad dhanaṃ kadāpi bhavad-dṛṣṭa-caraṃ
GR14muktacau:1707: tato'haṃ sa-smitaṃ - nāndīmukhi! vidyuc-camatkṛtim iva sakṛd īkṣitam asti |
GR14muktacau:1709: mayoktaṃ - ekasminn avasare nija-sarovara-snānād uttīrya nija-madhurāṅgataś
GR14muktacau:1710: cīnāṃśukena rahasi tayā niḥsāryamāṇe payasi sumanoharaṇāya daivāt
GR14muktacau:1711: tatraivāgatena mayā manāg evāvalokitaṃ tat tataḥ sā sabhayam iva sahasaiva
GR14muktacau:1718: api suṣṭhu-sthānam api nāpsyati kiṃ vā tad-dhana-samarpaṇa-pūrvakaṃ
GR14muktacau:1719: śuddha-bhāvena mām eva paricariṣyati | tad atikṣudrābhir ābhiḥ
GR14muktacau:1721: tataḥ kiñcit smitvā nāndīmukhīṃ prati rādhā anuccaiḥ prāha - ayi
GR14muktacau:1723: viśākhā - aho uḍḍīya calitum aśakyasya bimbīmātraika-bhojino bubhukṣitasya
GR14muktacau:1726: adhunaiva bhavad-rājyābhilāṣiṇīṃ rādhāṃ tāṃ bhavat-kara-gatāṃ vidhāsye |
GR14muktacau:1728: madhumaṅgalaḥ - māthura-rāja-pārśve phutkṛtya tad-aśvārūḍhānāṃ śatam ānīya
GR14muktacau:1730: abhimanyus tathā tāḍayitavyaḥ yathā sa eva tām ānīya dadāti |
GR14muktacau:1732: lalitā - viśākhe! kam api mahābhāgam uddiśya yat kiñcin nivedayāmi tat śṛṇu |
GR14muktacau:1734: tataḥ kadamba-bhūruhāgram abhivīkṣya lalitā - bho vṛndāvana-cara-tapasvi-vara!
GR14muktacau:1735: tvaṃ tāvat phalāhārī khyātas tat-sva-maryādhām ullaṅghya
GR14muktacau:1738: viśākhā - lalite! bubhukṣito'yaṃ tapasvī phalam anālabhya etad ayogyam api kartuṃ
GR14muktacau:1739: pravṛtto'sti | tad uttama-phalam asmai samuddiśyatām | tathāpi dharma-vṛddhir
GR14muktacau:1741: lalitā smitam apavarya - viśākhe! kim asau mānasa-jāhnavīṃ na jānāti ?
GR14muktacau:1742: viśākhā - sarvatra bhramaṇa-śīlo'yam atiprasiddhāṃ tāṃ kathaṃ na jñāsyati ?
GR14muktacau:1743: lalitā - tad vāyavya-tīre sarvataś-calā kācid apūrva-padmā sphuṭam ekā vallarī
GR14muktacau:1744: vartate | tasyā madhya-bhāge parama-manoharaṃ ahrasvaṃ tumbī-phala-dvandvaṃ
GR14muktacau:1746: viśākhā - gosvāmin! tvaritam eva tatra gatvā
GR14muktacau:1749: tataḥ sarvāsu hasantīṣu mayoktaṃ - lalite! tapasya-sāvayācita-vṛttiḥ kara-pātrī
GR14muktacau:1750: bhakṣaṇe niṣiddhaṃ tumbīphalaṃ nopabhuṅkte | kintu atraiva
GR14muktacau:1751: nirbhara-nija-pradyota-bhareṇa yā dṛśyamānāpi na dṛśyate | tasyāḥ kāñcanavallyāḥ
GR14muktacau:1752: kroḍe madhura-rasa-maya-śrī-phala-dvandvaṃ yad vidyotate tat svayam eva
GR14muktacau:1753: saivāgatya praṇaya-pūrvakaṃ madhura-vacanenainaṃ nimantryāsya karo yadi
GR14muktacau:1754: pariveśayati, tadā tad-upabhogena sukhī bhavann asau tathāśiṣayati yathā
GR14muktacau:1756: tatas tan niśamya rādhā anuccaiḥ - narma-lampaṭo'yaṃ dhūrtaḥ | śaṅke
GR14muktacau:1757: vaidagdhyenātratyāṃ mad-avasthitim avadhārya mām eva kadarthayitum imāṃ
GR14muktacau:1758: vacana-bhaṅgīṃ vitanoti | tad itaḥ kuñjāntaram āsādya sva-gopanam eva nūnam
GR14muktacau:1760: iti manasi bhāvayantyāṃ tasyāṃ punar mayoktaṃ - priya-sakhi lalite! ayaṃ
GR14muktacau:1761: vṛndāvana-cārī mahā-vinodī kṣuṇṇa-yūtheśāṃ tvāṃ paṭṭa-rājñīṃ vidhāya tvayā
GR14muktacau:1763: ālokayitym abhilaṣati tad ājñāpyatām etā nṛtyantu |
GR14muktacau:1765: asya vidūṣakasya narma-dhanam eva dāpayituṃ vayam atra vyāghoṭyānītāḥ smaḥ
GR14muktacau:1766: ? tad etāṃ narmādi-gati-kriyām apahāya yathāsau subalena saha yathārthaṃ lekham
GR14muktacau:1767: ācarya kedārikā-karaṃ dadāti tathā vidhāyāsmān drutaṃ gṛhāya prasthāpaya |
GR14muktacau:1768: nāndīmukhī - bhavatīnāṃ kiyān karaḥ saṃmataḥ syāt tat tāvat kathaya |
GR14muktacau:1769: lalitā - śyāmākādi-kṣetra-karato dhānyasyādhikaḥ karo lagati | tato'pi kārpāsasya |
GR14muktacau:1774: nāndīmukhī - kiyat pramāṇaṃ sa khalu māna-daṇḍaḥ ?
GR14muktacau:1775: lalitā - mayā kathyamānaḥ sa khalu kena pratīyatāṃ | tad etat kṣetra-pālikayā
GR14muktacau:1777: nāndīmukhī - bhadraṃ vṛnde! madhyasthayā tvayaiva muktā-māna-daṇḍaḥ kṛtvā
GR14muktacau:1787: nāndīmukhī - lalite! yady api tad eva yuktaṃ bhavati tathāpi
GR14muktacau:1788: vrajendra-kumāra-mukham ālokya bhagavatī-paricārikāṃ māṃ ca dṛṣṭvā
GR14muktacau:1790: lalitā - vṛnde! tvaṃ tāval lekha-kriyāyāṃ māna-viṣaye ca nipuṇyāsi tat sarvābhiḥ
GR14muktacau:1794: lalitā - kāmaṃ kathyatāṃ yogyaṃ cet kartavyam |
GR14muktacau:1795: nāndīmukhī - ayaṃ tāvat sva-deśaṃ vihāyātrāgato navīna-prāghunaḥ tatrāpi
GR14muktacau:1796: vṛndāvana-rājñīm āśrito'sti ihāpi bahv-āyāsenojjaṭa-bhūmiṃ kṛṣṭvā vaḥ
GR14muktacau:1797: prakāma-dhana-lābhaṃ vardhayann asti | tasmān māne kṛte bhavatīnāṃ
GR14muktacau:1798: bhoga-rāgādi-vyayena bahu-hānyā punaḥ kṛṣi-karaṇo vimanaska iva bhaviṣyati |

GR14muktacau:2101: ādadānas tṛṇaṃ dantair idaṃ yāce punaḥ punaḥ |
GR14muktacau:2104: gucchaḥ puṣpa-bharair vyadhāyi ya iha śrī-rūpa-saṃśikṣayā |
GR14muktacau:2106: ghrāṇais taṃ paribhūṣitaṃ na tanutāṃ tat-keli-śīdhūtka-dhīḥ ||2||
